NK121(ko)003:3034: kun brtags gtan nas med na gzhan dbang yang med
NK121(ko)003:3035: des na yongs grub kyang med pas mtshan nyid gsum
NK121(ko)003:3036: char la skur ba btab par 'gyur zhes gsungs na
NK121(ko)003:3037: / yul snang 'di sems gnyis su snang ba yin
NK121(ko)003:3038: de la dngos po med pas kun brtag yin zhes
NK121(ko)003:3040: de nas sems bden med du bshad pas yul can la zhen pa 'gog pa yin la /
NK121(ko)003:3041: gnyis su med kyang tha snyad du phan tshun dmigs
NK121(ko)003:3042: pa dang dmigs rkyen du bzhag pa gong du bshad
NK121(ko)003:3043: / de ltar brtags na bya ba dang byed po
NK121(ko)003:3044: med kyang shes pa rang nyid de la rmi lam
NK121(ko)003:3046: de bas na byis pa mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i blo can rnams ni /
NK121(ko)003:3047: 'jig rten 'di na dngos po med pa'i chos la spyod pa de ni dper na /
NK121(ko)003:3048: rgyang ring po nas smig rgyu mthong ba de la chur 'dzin pa dang /
NK121(ko)003:3049: mig skyon can la skra shad dang zla ba gnyis pa la zla ba'i dngos por 'dzin pa dang /
NK121(ko)003:3050: rmi lam gyi yul na shes pa las gzhan pa'i
NK121(ko)003:3051: yul med kyang yod par bzung nas rang nyid de
NK121(ko)003:3053: ye shes snang ba rgyan gyi mdo las /
NK121(ko)003:3054: rtag tu skye med chos ni de bzhin gshegs //
NK121(ko)003:3055: chos rnams thams cad de bzhin gshegs dang 'dra //
NK121(ko)003:3056: byis pa'i blo can mtshan mar 'dzin pa rnams //
NK121(ko)003:3057: 'jig rten na ni med pa'i chos la spyod //
NK121(ko)003:3060: gang zhig yod pa mi mthong med mthong ba //
NK121(ko)003:3061: 'di 'dra'i mun nag rnam pa de gang zhig /
NK121(ko)003:3063: de bas na kun brtag dngos med la dngos po'i
NK121(ko)003:3064: mtshan mar bzung nas don byed par rlom pa ni
NK121(ko)003:3065: so so skye bo rang kha'i yul te /
NK121(ko)003:3066: smig rgyu la chur bzung nas don byed par rlom pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir /
NK121(ko)003:3067: rang bzhin med kyang sems kyi yul du med bzhin
NK121(ko)003:3068: tha snyad du snang ba dag la bsten pa rgyu
NK121(ko)003:3069: 'bras kyi bya byed 'jog nus pa 'jig rten rnal
NK121(ko)003:3070: 'byor pa rnams kyi yul yin te /
NK121(ko)003:3071: rmi lam la dngos med kyang don byed par snang
NK121(ko)003:3072: la chos thams cad rmi lam ltar rtogs pa la
NK121(ko)003:3073: dngos po med kyang don byed par snang ba mi
NK121(ko)003:3074: 'gal ba'i phyir / ting 'dzin rgyal po las /
NK121(ko)003:3075: srid gsum rmi lam dang 'dra snying po med //
NK121(ko)003:3076: myur du 'jig cing mi rtag sgyu ma bzhin //
NK121(ko)003:3077: 'ong ba med cing 'di nas 'gro ba'ang med //
NK121(ko)003:3078: rgyun rnams rtag tu stong zhing mtshan ma med //
NK121(ko)003:3081: chos rnams stong pa 'di shes nas //
NK121(ko)003:3082: las dang 'bras bu brten pa gang //
NK121(ko)003:3083: ngo mtshar bas kyang 'di ngo mtshar //
NK121(ko)003:3084: rmad byung bas kyang 'di rmad byung //
NK121(ko)003:3086: gsum pa yongs grub la bzhi /
NK121(ko)003:3087: chos nyid la mthong du med pa //
NK121(ko)003:3088: snod bcud stong par bstan pa //
NK121(ko)003:3089: mjug 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad stong par bstan pa /
NK121(ko)003:3090: de'i gdams pa gtan tshigs dang bcas pa'o //
NK121(ko)003:3093: 3 dper na gnyid sad pa na rmi lam gyi yul dbang shes gsum med pa bzhin /
NK121(ko)003:3094: phyi nang gi dngos por snang ba'i yul dbang shes pa 'di yang /
NK121(ko)003:3095: ma rig pa'i gnyid sad de chos nyid kyi bden pa mngon sum mthong nas med de /
NK121(ko)003:3097: 'di na ji ltar sad bzhin ji srid du //
NK121(ko)003:3098: ma sad de srid de la gsum char yod //
NK121(ko)003:3099: sad par gyur na gsum char med pa ltar /
NK121(ko)003:3100: gti mug gnyid sad las kyang de bzhin no //
NK121(ko)003:3102: 'phags pa'i mnyam bzhag na gzung 'dzin med cing rjes
NK121(ko)003:3103: thob dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes la gzung
NK121(ko)003:3104: 'dzin gnyis snang yod kyang 'dzin pa med de mkhas
NK121(ko)003:3105: pa'i mdun na mgal me bskor ba bzhin no //
NK121(ko)003:3114: rten 'brel gyi rigs pas ma grub par bstan pa'o //
NK121(ko)003:3117: 3 de bas na da lta'i yul snang rnams 'di ltar du med de /
NK121(ko)003:3118: rang gi rnam par rtog pas med pa la yod par brtags pa yin /
NK121(ko)003:3119: yang na sangs rgyas la yul snang 'di ltar yod dam snyam na med de /
NK121(ko)003:3120: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes lhun gyis grub
NK121(ko)003:3121: pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'dus byas skad cig ma 'di
NK121(ko)003:3122: dag ma gzigs pa'i phyir yang yul med do //
NK121(ko)003:3125: gti mug gnyid kyis mthong ba yin //
NK121(ko)003:3126: zhes pas sangs rgyas la gti mug mi manga'o //
NK121(ko)003:3127: sangs rgyas la ji snyed mkhyen pa mi mnga' 'am zhe na mnga' med /
NK121(ko)003:3128: rang snang gi ldog pa de mkhyen no //
NK121(ko)003:3129: 'o na nga'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten
NK121(ko)003:3130: gyi khams la la dag la la ma dag pa
NK121(ko)003:3132: sems can gzhan gyi snang ba'o //
NK121(ko)003:3136: 3 yul ma zad par rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin
NK121(ko)003:3137: pa dang bcas pa yi rtog pa'i sems kyang yod
NK121(ko)003:3138: na'ang so sor rtog pa'i ye shes rab kyis dpyad
NK121(ko)003:3139: de sngo ser sogs kha dog dang gru bzhi sogs
NK121(ko)003:3140: dbyibs dang ni / pho mo la sogs pa'i dngos
NK121(ko)003:3141: por ma grub pas snang rung ma dmigs pas khegs
NK121(ko)003:3142: dbyibs dang ni / so // gsum pa ni /
NK121(ko)003:3144: 1 yang na sems ni skad cig ma du ma
NK121(ko)003:3145: yin pas de la rang bzhin gcig tu grub pa
NK121(ko)003:3146: med la / rgyun yod pas snyam na skad cig snga phyi min pa'i rgyun mi rnyed /
NK121(ko)003:3148: rab 'byor sems kyi rgyun zhes bya ba ni de
NK121(ko)003:3149: rgyun med par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i phyir
NK121(ko)003:3152: yang na ltos pa'i rig pas dpyad na yul med
NK121(ko)003:3153: pas na yul can sems med de de gnyis phan
NK121(ko)003:3157: 3 yang na rten 'brel gyi rigs pas dpyad na
NK121(ko)003:3158: sems ni bdag rkyen dbang po dang dmigs rkyen gzugs
NK121(ko)003:3159: sogs las skye bas rten 'brel yin pa'i phyir rang
NK121(ko)003:3160: gi ngo bos skye ba med do //
NK121(ko)003:3161: yang na sems ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams
NK121(ko)003:3162: kyis ma gzigs pa dkon brtsegs las bshad pas khegs
NK121(ko)003:3163: so // de bas na rlung sems tsam las grub
NK121(ko)003:3164: pa'i khams gsum 'khor ba'i 'di ngo bo nyid nas
NK121(ko)003:3165: stong zhing bdag gnyis su grub pa med do //
NK121(ko)003:3166: gnyis pa myang 'das ma grub pa ni /
NK121(ko)003:3168: 6 de ltar 'khor ba rang bzhin gyis med pas
NK121(ko)003:3169: de spangs pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'ang rang bzhin
NK121(ko)003:3170: gyis med de / 'khor 'das ye nas 'ching grol med pa la 'ching grol du btags pa ni /
NK121(ko)003:3173: 'jig rten mgon gyis bstan pa ste //
NK121(ko)003:3174: mkha' la mdud pa bor ba ni //
NK121(ko)003:3175: nam mkha' nyid kyis bkrol ba yin //
NK121(ko)003:3177: mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug sangs rgyas nyag gcig yin la /
NK121(ko)003:3178: sangs rgyas de yi chos kyi sku ni chos dbyings
NK121(ko)003:3179: spros pa thams cad dang bral ba dang dbyer med
NK121(ko)003:3181: de nyid la'ang rang rgyud du bzhag pa'i dngos po
NK121(ko)003:3182: med par 'jig rten pa'i ngos nas bzhag pa'i tha
NK121(ko)003:3183: snyad tsam mo // gdul bya la snang ba'i gzugs
NK121(ko)003:3184: sku rnam pa gnyis ni ye shes chos sku'i bdag
NK121(ko)003:3185: rkyen las byung ba'i gzugs brnyan tsam yin te /
NK121(ko)003:3187: de bzhin gshegs pa zag pa med pa yi //
NK121(ko)003:3188: dge ba'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan lta bu yin //
NK121(ko)003:3189: de bzhin nyid dang bde gshegs byang chub med //
NK121(ko)003:3190: 'jig rten thams cad kyis ni gzugs brnyan mthong //
NK121(ko)003:3192: ye shes la'ang rang bzhin med pas de'i gzugs brnyan yin phyir dngos po med pa'am /
NK121(ko)003:3193: yang na chu zla'i gzugs brnyan lta bu yin pa'i phyir dngos po med pas na /
NK121(ko)003:3194: yang dag par ni sangs rgyas med cing ming btags pa tsam ste ming yang dngos po med do //
NK121(ko)003:3196: gang dag sangs rgyas spros 'das shing //
NK121(ko)003:3197: zad pa med la spro byed pa //
NK121(ko)003:3198: spros pas nyams pa de kun gyis //
NK121(ko)003:3199: de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong ngo //
NK121(ko)003:3201: bzhi pa de'i gdams pa gtan tshigs la bzhi ste /
NK121(ko)003:3202: dang po snang stong dbyer med kyang lta bas thag bcad pa /
NK121(ko)003:3203: bar du bsam brjod kyi mtha' dang bral bar 'jog pa /
NK121(ko)003:3204: tha ma chos thams cad nam mkha' dang 'dra ba /
NK121(ko)003:3205: de nyid thos bsam gyis rtogs pa'i thabs bstan pa'o //
NK121(ko)003:3207: mdor na 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos rnams la /
NK121(ko)003:3208: rang bzhin nam ngo bo dang bdag dang bden par grub pa sogs ming gi rnam grangs te /
NK121(ko)003:3210: de la bdag ces bya ba ni gang zhig dngos
NK121(ko)003:3211: po rnams kyi gzhan la rag ma lus pa'i ngo
NK121(ko)003:3213: de med pa ni bdag med pa'o //
NK121(ko)003:3214: de ni chos dang gang zag gi dbye bas gnyis su rtogs te /
NK121(ko)003:3215: chos kyi bdag med pa dang gang zag gi bdag med pa'o //
NK121(ko)003:3216: zhes pa ltar bdag med kyi gnas lugs la gzhal
NK121(ko)003:3217: na sgyu ma'i spros pa tsam du'ang khas blang du
NK121(ko)003:3218: med pa'i phyir / tha snyad la cir snang ci
NK121(ko)003:3219: srid thams cad snang bzhin du gnas tshod la chos
NK121(ko)003:3220: nyid stong pa nyid las ma 'das la /
NK121(ko)003:3221: chos nyid de la byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ste /
NK121(ko)003:3222: bdag med la dris pa'i mdor /
NK121(ko)003:3223: dngos po med cing dmigs su med //
NK121(ko)003:3224: thams cad stong pa gnas med pa //
NK121(ko)003:3225: spros pa rnams las yan lag 'das //
NK121(ko)003:3226: byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid yin //
NK121(ko)003:3227: zhes gsungs pa ni dom dam bden pa mthar thug pa'i mtshan nyid do //
NK121(ko)003:3228: de yang byang chub par bya ba dang byed pa
NK121(ko)003:3229: mi dmigs pa'i phyir sangs rgyas byang chub tha snyad
NK121(ko)003:3230: tsam ste dngos po med cing /
NK121(ko)003:3231: yod med gnyis ni phan tshun ltos pa'i dbang gis
NK121(ko)003:3232: bzhag pa'i chos yin la rang gi mtshan nyid kyis
NK121(ko)003:3233: ma grub la / yod pa ma grub pas na
NK121(ko)003:3234: de la ltos nas med pa'ang grub pa med de
NK121(ko)003:3235: ma grub la / / de gnyis phan tshun med
NK121(ko)003:3236: na mi 'byung gi rgyu yin pas don la gnyis
NK121(ko)003:3237: ma grub la / / ka med la / de
NK121(ko)003:3238: bas yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma
NK121(ko)003:3240: de bzhin du chos can ka bum sogs kyi rang
NK121(ko)003:3241: mtshan la dpyad nas ci yang med pa chos nyid
NK121(ko)003:3244: gal te mi stong cung zad yod //
NK121(ko)003:3245: stong pa'ang cung zad yod par 'gyur //
NK121(ko)003:3246: mi stong cung zad yod min na //
NK121(ko)003:3247: stong pa yod par ga la 'gyur //
NK121(ko)003:3250: gzugs kyi skye ba med do snyam du dpyad na sher phyin la spyod kyi /
NK121(ko)003:3251: gzugs kyi skye ba med pa yod do snyam na sher phyin la mi dpyod do //
NK121(ko)003:3253: 'di ltar so skyes kyi gcig tu bral gyi rigs
NK121(ko)003:3254: pa dang 'phags pa'i mnyam bzhag gi rig ngor skye
NK121(ko)003:3255: ba 'gog pa yin gyi skye med sgrub pa ma
NK121(ko)003:3256: yin no // stong nyid la dngos por zhen pa ni gsor mi rung ba'i lta ba ste /
NK121(ko)003:3258: kun rtog thams cad spang ba'i phyir //
NK121(ko)003:3259: stong nyid bdud rtsi bstan par mdzad //
NK121(ko)003:3260: gang zhig de la zhen gyur pa //
NK121(ko)003:3261: de yang khyod kyis spong ba yin //
NK121(ko)003:3263: des na yod med kyi mtha' gnyis ma grub cing
NK121(ko)003:3264: med pa'i phyir de gnyis la ltos pa'i dbus kyang
NK121(ko)003:3266: gzhan las shes min zhi ba dang //
NK121(ko)003:3267: spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa //
NK121(ko)003:3268: rnam rtog med don tha dad med //
NK121(ko)003:3269: de ni de nyid mtshan nyid do //
NK121(ko)003:3271: chos nyid zab mo de yid la bsam zhing ngag gis brjod du med pa la /
NK121(ko)003:3272: mtha' thams cad dang bral ba'i dbu ma'o snyam du /
NK121(ko)003:3273: dbus su gnas par brtags na mtha' gnyis 'jog byed
NK121(ko)003:3274: kyi gzhi yod par bzung bas de la ltos pa'i
NK121(ko)003:3275: mtha' yang mi khegs pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro //
NK121(ko)003:3276: 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin rgyal po las /
NK121(ko)003:3277: rtag dang mi rtag 'di yang mtha' yin te //
NK121(ko)003:3278: yod dang med ces bya ba gnyis ka mtha' //
NK121(ko)003:3279: de phyir gnyis ka'i mtha' ni rnam spangs nas //
NK121(ko)003:3280: mkhas pas dbus la'ang gnas par mi bya'o //
NK121(ko)003:3282: de phyir chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin ni dper
NK121(ko)003:3283: na nam mkha' la kha dog sna tshogs pa'i lho
NK121(ko)003:3284: sprin ji ltar snang yang snang bzhin stong pas dngos
NK121(ko)003:3285: po ci yang med pa bzhin du /
NK121(ko)003:3286: don dam dpyod byed kyi rigs pa sngon du song
NK121(ko)003:3287: ba'i lag rjes las byung ba'i chos kun ji ltar
NK121(ko)003:3288: snang yang / de la dgag pa dang sgrub pa'i
NK121(ko)003:3289: rtog pa gang yang mi dgos te dngos med du
NK121(ko)003:3290: snang yang / dpyad zin cing / snang stong zung
NK121(ko)003:3291: 'jug yin pas snang ba nyid nas dngos por dmigs
NK121(ko)003:3292: snang yang / dpyad zin cing / pa med de
NK121(ko)003:3293: / yod med dbus dang gsum du ma grub pa
NK121(ko)003:3294: bshad ma thag pa'i phyir ro //
NK121(ko)003:3296: gang zhig dngos rnams dngos med shes pa de //
NK121(ko)003:3297: nam yang dngos po kun la chags mi 'gyur //
NK121(ko)003:3298: gang zhig nam yang dngos kun chags med pa //
NK121(ko)003:3299: de ni ting 'dzin mtshan ma med la reg /
NK121(ko)003:3303: 'jam dpal byang chen brjod nges pa gang mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod dam /
NK121(ko)003:3305: byang chen gang la la rmi lam du yang don
NK121(ko)003:3306: dam par rdzas dang dngos po dang ngo bo'i sems
NK121(ko)003:3307: mi skye ba de ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
NK121(ko)003:3308: shin tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro //
NK121(ko)003:3310: dngos po la mngon par zhen pa ni brjed pa
NK121(ko)003:3311: med par mnyam par bzhag kyang rnam par g.yeng ba
NK121(ko)003:3312: dang 'dra'o // skabs 'dir chos thams cad rten cing
NK121(ko)003:3313: 'brel te 'byung ba yin pas de grub pa'i mtshan
NK121(ko)003:3314: nyid la rigs pa bzhi ste /
NK121(ko)003:3315: rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid can chos rnams kyi rang bzhin te /
NK121(ko)003:3316: me kho na tsha chu kho na gsher gyi gzhan
NK121(ko)003:3317: ni ma yin no zhes pa lta bu ni chos
NK121(ko)003:3318: nyid kyi rigs pa ste ngo bo nyid kyi sgo
NK121(ko)003:3319: nas grub pa / chos thams cad rgyu la ma
NK121(ko)003:3320: ltos pa yin pas thams cad 'bras bu'i don du
NK121(ko)003:3321: 'byung zhing rtag pa med cing mi rtag pa yang
NK121(ko)003:3322: rgyu la ltos pa yin zhes pa lta bu ltos
NK121(ko)003:3323: pa'i rigs pa ste rgyu'i sgo nas sgrub pa'o //
NK121(ko)003:3324: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rigs pa ni 'bras bu khyad par can skye bar nges pa ste /
NK121(ko)003:3325: mig kho nas mig gi rnam par shes pa skyed
NK121(ko)003:3326: kyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes pa lta bu
NK121(ko)003:3327: 'bras bu'i sgo nas sgrub pa ste bya ba byed
NK121(ko)003:3328: pa'i rigs pa dang gcig bshad tshul mi 'dra ba
NK121(ko)003:3329: yod / mtshan nyid gsum pa'i gtan tshigs kyis bsgrub
NK121(ko)003:3330: bya'i don sgrub par byed pa ni 'thad pas sgrub
NK121(ko)003:3331: yod / pa'i rigs pa'o // 'di ni shes par byed pa'i yul can dang /
NK121(ko)003:3332: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i de gnyis ni skyed pa'i yul can no //
NK121(ko)003:3333: 'di rnams kyi sel ba bzhi ni /
NK121(ko)003:3334: ngo bo nyid la the tshom za ba dang /
NK121(ko)003:3335: byed pa la the tshom za ba dang /
NK121(ko)003:3336: mngon par 'grub pa la the tshom za ba dang /
NK121(ko)003:3337: rigs pa la the tshom za ba'o //
NK121(ko)003:3338: de la chos nyid kyi rigs pa la skyon med
NK121(ko)003:3339: pa me shel la tsha ba yod pa lta bu
NK121(ko)003:3341: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas la ni 'thad pas sgrub mi nus pas lung gis so //
NK121(ko)003:3342: rigs pa bzhis chos thams cad klan ka dang lan
NK121(ko)003:3343: du bcas pas ston par nus pa'i phyir rigs pa'i
NK121(ko)003:3347: 10 de ltar gtan tshigs du mas dpyad tshe 'adi'o
NK121(ko)003:3348: zhes blo yul na ci yang med pa de'i tshe
NK121(ko)003:3349: dngos dang dngos med kyi rnam pa ci yang bsam
NK121(ko)003:3350: du med cing / mig dang rna bas mthong thos
NK121(ko)003:3351: la sogs pa'i tha snyad rnams dang bral ba dang
NK121(ko)003:3352: sems dang sems byung gi shes pa kun gyi yul
NK121(ko)003:3353: du med cing / las 'das te / de la
NK121(ko)003:3354: rnam par shes pa'i gnas med cing don dam blo
NK121(ko)003:3355: yi spyod yul min zhes pa'i don no //
NK121(ko)003:3356: de la mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa la
NK121(ko)003:3357: sogs pa'i tshad ma gzhan gyi yul du byas nas
NK121(ko)003:3359: tha snyad du mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang ro gcig tu gyur pa'i phyir /
NK121(ko)003:3361: gang tshe 'dus byas 'dus ma byas dang dkar nag chos //
NK121(ko)003:3362: shes rab rnam par bshig nas rdul tsam mi dmigs tshe //
NK121(ko)003:3363: 'jig rten dag na shes rab pha rol phyin grangs 'gro //
NK121(ko)003:3364: nam mkha' gang la'ang cung zad mi gnas de dang 'dra //
NK121(ko)003:3366: de bas na glang po rtsal gyi mdo las /
NK121(ko)003:3367: gal te chos rnams rang bzhin 'ga' yod na //
NK121(ko)003:3368: rgyal ba nyan thos bcas pas de mkhyen 'gyur //
NK121(ko)003:3370: kun mkhyen rgyal bas kyang dngos po'i chos gcig kyang ma gzigs pa'i phyir dang /
NK121(ko)003:3372: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na //
NK121(ko)003:3373: gzod nas zhi zhing ma skyes pa'i //
NK121(ko)003:3374: rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa yi //
NK121(ko)003:3375: chos rnams mgon po khyed kyis bstan //
NK121(ko)003:3376: zhes pas chos thams cad de bzhin nyid kho na las brtsam ste bstan pas /
NK121(ko)003:3377: sgra rtog gi mtshan nyid can gyi tshig gcig tsam gyi chos kyang bshad pa med de /
NK121(ko)003:3378: gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mdor /
NK121(ko)003:3379: bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas nas mya ngan las 'das
NK121(ko)003:3380: kyi bar du lce rkan gyi rtsol ba las byung
NK121(ko)003:3381: ba'i tha na yig 'bru gcig kyang ma gsungs so
NK121(ko)003:3382: // zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la dbugs
NK121(ko)003:3383: dbyung rngubs dang slong byed kyi rtog pa mi mnga'
NK121(ko)003:3384: zhing sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi gsang ba bsam gyis
NK121(ko)003:3385: // mi khyab pa'o // 'o na sde snod gsum bshad pas so she na /
NK121(ko)003:3386: de ni gdul bya'i rtogs pa'i dbang gis so so'i
NK121(ko)003:3387: mos pa ltar sde snod gsum po de bzhin nyid
NK121(ko)003:3388: kyi ngang las brag cha bzhin du bshad par snang
NK121(ko)003:3389: ngo // des na gdul bya 'dul byed dam chos
NK121(ko)003:3390: dang chos nyid 'dus byas 'dus ma byas sogs rang
NK121(ko)003:3391: bzhin gyis so sor yod na ci yang yin du
NK121(ko)003:3392: ngo // rung ba'i phyir / bsam pa'i yul du'ang
NK121(ko)003:3393: 'gyur na de lta bu min te bsam brjod las
NK121(ko)003:3394: 'das pa yin te blo ni kun rdzob yin par
NK121(ko)003:3395: ngo // rung ba'i phyir / brjod / ces gsungs pas /
NK121(ko)003:3396: bsam brjod kyi yul du gyur pa ni kun rdzob
NK121(ko)003:3397: brtags pa tsam ste don la gnyis snang 'khrul ba
NK121(ko)003:3398: yin no // de ltar dpyad 'jog spel ma ci
NK121(ko)003:3399: rigs pa sngon du btang nas sgom pa la 'jug
NK121(ko)003:3400: yin no // na legs te / gzhan du na
NK121(ko)003:3401: dngos po'i mtshan nyid gtan la ma phebs pas de
NK121(ko)003:3402: sgom pa la 'jug par yang mi 'gyur la /
NK121(ko)003:3403: zhugs kyang the tshom za bar yang 'gyur zhing sgrib
NK121(ko)003:3404: pa spong ba'i gnyen por mi 'gyur ba mu stegs
NK121(ko)003:3405: lhag spyod kyi ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa dang 'dra
NK121(ko)003:3406: bar gsungs / gtan la phab nas bsgom na thog mar sgom pa la 'jug cing /
NK121(ko)003:3407: zhugs nas the tshom mi za zhing sgrib pa'i gnyen
NK121(ko)003:3408: por 'gyur bas mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyur 'gyur
NK121(ko)003:3410: gal te chos la bdag med so sor rtog /
NK121(ko)003:3411: so sor de brtags gal te sgom pa ni /
NK121(ko)003:3412: de ni mya ngan 'das thob 'bras bu'i rgyu /
NK121(ko)003:3413: rgyu gzhan gang yin des ni zhi mi 'gyur //
NK121(ko)003:3417: de bas na chos kun ni spros pa med pa nam mkha'i mtshan nyid yin te /
NK121(ko)003:3418: nam mkha' ni ming tsam las mtshan ma ci yang med pa de ltar na /
NK121(ko)003:3419: chos thams cad ni da ltar dpyad mthas stong pa
NK121(ko)003:3420: tsam min par ye nas stong pa nyid yin pa'i
NK121(ko)003:3421: phyir / tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis zhus pa las /
NK121(ko)003:3422: 'jig rten nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
NK121(ko)003:3423: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
NK121(ko)003:3424: de dag de yi 'gro rig nas //
NK121(ko)003:3425: 'jig rten chos kyis mi gos so //
NK121(ko)003:3427: yang dag pa'i gnas lugs de la gzhal na nyon
NK121(ko)003:3428: mongs pa spang du med cing byang chub sgrub tu
NK121(ko)003:3429: med de / chos thams cad 'byung ba med par bstan pa'i mdo las /
NK121(ko)003:3430: 'dod chags mi dmigs de bzhin zhe sdang dang //
NK121(ko)003:3431: gti mug 'di yang nam yang mi dmigs so //
NK121(ko)003:3432: chos kun nam mkha' 'dra bar rab shes pa //
NK121(ko)003:3433: de ltar sus shes de ni rgyal por 'gyur //
NK121(ko)003:3435: de ltar na byang chub thob pa dang mi thob
NK121(ko)003:3436: pa'i re dogs te phung po spangs nas byang chub
NK121(ko)003:3437: thob bya'am blang byar sems pa med de /
NK121(ko)003:3438: thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben zhing stong pa'i phyir /
NK121(ko)003:3440: phung po rang bzhin dben zhing stong pa nyid //
NK121(ko)003:3441: byang chub rang bzhin dben zhing stong pa nyid //
NK121(ko)003:3442: gang spyod de yang rang bzhin stong pa ste //
NK121(ko)003:3443: ye shes ldan gyis shes rab byis pas min //
NK121(ko)003:3445: mnyam pa nyid kyi don ma mthong bas re dogs spang blang gi mthar lhung ba bdud las te /
NK121(ko)003:3446: dri ma med par grags pa'i mdo las /
NK121(ko)003:3447: rnam par grol ba ni 'dod chags dang zhe sdang
NK121(ko)003:3448: dang gti mug spangs pas grol ba ma yin nam
NK121(ko)003:3450: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug spangs pas
NK121(ko)003:3451: rnam par grol lo zhes zer ba ni nga rgyal
NK121(ko)003:3453: gang nga med pa rnams kyis ni 'dod chags dang
NK121(ko)003:3454: zhe sdang dang gti mug gi rang bzhin nyid rnam
NK121(ko)003:3458: 'di ltar 'phags pa dgra bcom pa rnams ni bdag
NK121(ko)003:3459: gis nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs so snyam pa'i
NK121(ko)003:3460: rlom sems yod na'ang dgra bcom par mi 'gyur ro
NK121(ko)003:3464: bcom ldan 'das bdag 'dod chags dang bral ba dgra
NK121(ko)003:3465: bcom pa lags kyang dgra bcom pa'o snyam du mi
NK121(ko)003:3466: sems lags so // zhes gsungs pas 'phags pa'i gang
NK121(ko)003:3467: zag thams cad kyi lam gyi dngos gzhi 'dus ma
NK121(ko)003:3468: byas pa yin pas de la spang blang gi rlom
NK121(ko)003:3469: sems lags so // sems med do // rnam par
NK121(ko)003:3470: thar pa gsum dang lam dang gnyen po yang med
NK121(ko)003:3471: sems lags so // sems med do // de /
NK121(ko)003:3472: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid ni dben
NK121(ko)003:3473: pa'i mtshan nyid can te dngos por lta ba'i gnyen
NK121(ko)003:3474: sems lags so // sems med do // de /
NK121(ko)003:3475: po dang / de bzhin du mtshan ma med pa'i
NK121(ko)003:3476: ting nge 'dzin ni zhi ba'i mtshan nyid can te
NK121(ko)003:3477: mtshan mar lta ba'i gnyen po dang /
NK121(ko)003:3478: smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni smon pa
NK121(ko)003:3479: la chags pa'i gnyen po ste sdug bsngal sel ba'i
NK121(ko)003:3481: de ltar sgom par 'dod pa yang mnyam pa nyid
NK121(ko)003:3482: kyi don ma mthong bas blang dor gyis bcings pa'o
NK121(ko)003:3483: // 'o na rnal 'byor pa'i rnam thar gang zhe na /
NK121(ko)003:3484: nges don gyi mdo las gsungs pa ltar /
NK121(ko)003:3485: spang gnyen dbyer med par rtogs pa ni thabs la mkhas pa'i rnam par thar ba'o //
NK121(ko)003:3486: spang bya la rdzas kyi mtshan ma med par rtogs
NK121(ko)003:3487: pa ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam par
NK121(ko)003:3488: thar ba'o // chos gang yang rang gi ngo bos
NK121(ko)003:3489: grub pa med par rtogs pa ni mngon par 'dus
NK121(ko)003:3490: ma byas pa'i rnam par thar ba'o //
NK121(ko)003:3491: zhes rnam grangs pa'i don dam de tsam mo //
NK121(ko)003:3492: don dam pa'i bden pa nyid kyang dngos po med
NK121(ko)003:3493: de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces gsungs pa'i
NK121(ko)003:3494: phyir / dbu ma snang ba dang rgyan las gsungs
NK121(ko)003:3495: pa'i don dam rnam grangs ba skye ba med 'gag
NK121(ko)003:3496: pa med la sogs pa med de spros pa kun
NK121(ko)003:3498: de'i phyir stong pa nyid bsgom zhes bya ba'ang tshig
NK121(ko)003:3499: bla dwags te tha snyad tsam yin gyi byis pa
NK121(ko)003:3500: 'dzub mos zla ba bzhin brtags sogs gang gis kyang
NK121(ko)003:3502: rtogs med tshul gyis rtogs pas na //
NK121(ko)003:3503: stong nyid mthong ba'i tha snyad btags //
NK121(ko)003:3505: bsgom par bya ba'i yul med cing sgom byed kyi
NK121(ko)003:3506: sems kyang med de gzung 'dzin gyi spros pa zhi
NK121(ko)003:3507: ba'i phyir / bsgom rgyu med de dmigs gtad med pa'i phyir /
NK121(ko)003:3508: mi bsgom par bzhag nas yod pa'ang med de ngo bo gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir /
NK121(ko)003:3509: rnam snang chos bdun gyis lus sems 'chos pa sogs
NK121(ko)003:3510: dang sgrib pa'i skyon dang shin sbyang sogs kyi yon
NK121(ko)003:3511: tan yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir na /
NK121(ko)003:3512: dmigs bya dmigs byed thams cad mi dmigs pa nam mkha'i rang bzhin no //
NK121(ko)003:3513: nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa las /
NK121(ko)003:3514: gang dag rang bzhin med chos 'di shes pa //
NK121(ko)003:3515: dpa' bo de dag 'jig rten mya ngan 'da' //
NK121(ko)003:3516: 'dod pa'i yon tan spyad kyang chags med cing //
NK121(ko)003:3517: chags pa rnams spangs sems can 'dul bar byed //
NK121(ko)003:3519: don dam dpyod pas stong nyid gtan la 'bebs pa
NK121(ko)003:3520: ni don dam pa'i ngo bo la dpyad bya tsam
NK121(ko)003:3521: med kyang glo bur sgro btags bsal ba yin la
NK121(ko)003:3522: / gshis na spros pa med par nges pa dang sgro btags sel ba dus mnyam mo //
NK121(ko)003:3523: des na stong pa nyid de ma mthong ba'i tshul
NK121(ko)003:3524: gyis mthong ba'i tha snyad bum med kyi phyogs su
NK121(ko)003:3525: bum pa ma mthong bar bum pa med pa mthong
NK121(ko)003:3528: nam mkha' mthong zhes sems can tshig tu rab brjod pa //
NK121(ko)003:3529: nam mkha' ji ltar mthong zhes don 'di brtag par gyis //
NK121(ko)003:3530: de ltar chos mthong ba yang de bzhin gshegs pas bstan //
NK121(ko)003:3531: mthong ba dpe gzhan gyis ni bsnyad par nus ma yin //
NK121(ko)003:3533: stong pa nyid kho na bsgom na phar phyin drug dgos sam snyam na /
NK121(ko)003:3534: rjes thob spyod pa dang 'brel ba gong du bshad la /
NK121(ko)003:3535: zhi lhag zung 'brel gyi ting nge 'dzin du mkhyen
NK121(ko)003:3536: gsum gyi rnam pa yongs rdzogs tshang ba sher phyin
NK121(ko)003:3538: rdo rje ting nge 'dzin gyi mdo las /
NK121(ko)003:3539: sems stong pa nyid du mi g.yo na pha rol tu phyin pa drug 'dus so //
NK121(ko)003:3541: tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis zhus pa las /
NK121(ko)003:3542: mi 'dzin pa ni sbyin pa yin pa sogs rgya cher gsungs so //
NK121(ko)003:3545: 9 ji skad bshad pa'i don dam pa de ji bzhin rtogs par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
NK121(ko)003:3546: dang po lung dang rtogs pa'i chos rnams mnyan pa
NK121(ko)003:3547: dang bsam pa dang sgom pa gsum gyi sgo nas
NK121(ko)003:3549: de gsum gyi yul yang dang po thos pa ni gtso bor ming la dmigs pa dang /
NK121(ko)003:3550: bsam pa ni sgra don 'brel ba ste ming don gnyis ka dang /
NK121(ko)003:3551: sgom pa'i yul ni don nyid yin te thos bsam
NK121(ko)003:3552: gyi shes rab ni don spyir so sor rtog pa'i
NK121(ko)003:3553: rnam par rtog pa mtshan 'dzin dang /
NK121(ko)003:3554: sgom pa ni rang mtshan la rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes yin pas so //
NK121(ko)003:3555: des na bsam pa dang sgom pa rnam pa gnyis kyi bsgom pa dang /
NK121(ko)003:3556: yang dag pa'i lung dang bla ma dam pa rtogs
NK121(ko)003:3557: goms can gyi man ngag la brten nas dpyad sgom
NK121(ko)003:3558: byed cing / gcig tu bral sogs kyi rigs pas kyang dpyad nas sgom pa ste /
NK121(ko)003:3559: yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa las /
NK121(ko)003:3560: stong pa zhi ba skye ba med pa'i tshul //
NK121(ko)003:3561: mi shes pas ni 'gro ba 'khyams 'gyur te //
NK121(ko)003:3562: de dag thugs rje mnga' bas thabs tshul gyis //
NK121(ko)003:3563: rigs pa brgya dag gis ni gzud par mdzad //
NK121(ko)003:3565: chos kun stong nyid yin pa'i gtan tshigs ni gong du so sor phyes shing bstan pa dang /
NK121(ko)003:3566: da dung de bzhin du dngos po kun gzhig cing
NK121(ko)003:3567: yang dang yang du don spyi'i tshul gyis dpyad na
NK121(ko)003:3568: / nam zhig tshig tsam la bsten pa ma yin
NK121(ko)003:3569: par blo shes rab kyis mngon sum du go bar
NK121(ko)003:3571: so so skye bo rnams ni rtog pas bcings //
NK121(ko)003:3572: mi rtog rnal 'byor pa de grol bar 'gyur //
NK121(ko)003:3573: rtog rnams log par gyur pa gang yin pa //
NK121(ko)003:3574: rnam par dpyod pa'i 'bras bur mkhas rnams bzhed //
NK121(ko)003:3576: 'dir tshogs lam na lung mang po la thos bsam
NK121(ko)003:3577: gyis dmigs pa tshol bas dmigs pa rnam byang zer
NK121(ko)003:3579: dmigs don de thos sogs gsum gyi shes rab la
NK121(ko)003:3580: bsten pa lam thams cad kyis rtogs bya chos nyid
NK121(ko)003:3581: yongs grub bdag med gnyis la go myong ci rigs
NK121(ko)003:3582: thon pa ni rang bzhin rnam byang ste sgom byung
NK121(ko)003:3584: mos spyod 'dir ni stong nyid kyi don spyi rtogs pas yid la byed /
NK121(ko)003:3585: de la don spyi'i tshul du rtogs zhes zer /
NK121(ko)003:3586: de la rang rig mngon sum yin par kha cig bzhed pa de legs /
NK121(ko)003:3587: kha cig mos spyod du stong nyid yin 'gyur gyi
NK121(ko)003:3588: myong ba tsam yin pas rtog med du bzhag na
NK121(ko)003:3589: lhag mthong med par 'gyur ro zhe na /
NK121(ko)003:3590: gzung 'dzin gyi snang ba gzugs brnyan dang sgyu ma
NK121(ko)003:3591: lta bu 'di las stong nyid gzhan na med pas
NK121(ko)003:3592: de rang rig mngon sum gyis myong ba khas len
NK121(ko)003:3593: na / re 'ga' de'i ngang du rtog med du bzhag na skyon med la /
NK121(ko)003:3594: spang byar zhen pa'i gnyen po bstan pa de la
NK121(ko)003:3595: zhen pa gtong mi thub pa de 'dra'i lam de
NK121(ko)003:3597: sbyor lam du 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das
NK121(ko)003:3598: pa'i rgyu 'bras kyi gzung rtog kyang ma grub pa'i
NK121(ko)003:3599: gsal snang dang / gang zag gi bdag rdzas su
NK121(ko)003:3600: grub pa med pa dang btags pa'i 'dzin rtog kyang
NK121(ko)003:3601: rang bzhin ma grub pa'i gzung 'dzin gnyis med kyi
NK121(ko)003:3602: shes rab ste shes sgrib dgag rtog bzhi'o //
NK121(ko)003:3603: de dag sgra don 'brel ba'i rtog pa las dngos
NK121(ko)003:3604: ma yin par don spyi gsal ba'i snang ba zla
NK121(ko)003:3605: ba gnyis pa dang lha'i gsal snang ltar yin par
NK121(ko)003:3606: gsungs / snang ngo'i nges pa de dbyibs dang kha
NK121(ko)003:3607: dog gis zla ba dpog pa ltar stong nyid dngos
NK121(ko)003:3608: min yang gnyis snang je phrar gyur pa'i nges pa
NK121(ko)003:3609: lhag par gyur pa ste chu snod kyi zla ba
NK121(ko)003:3610: ltar de ni stong nyid dngos dang 'dra zhes kyang
NK121(ko)003:3611: gsungs / bshad / de nas gnyis snang nub nas
NK121(ko)003:3612: mthong lam du stong nyid mngon sum mthong nas de
NK121(ko)003:3613: gsungs / bshad / la gnas / sgom lam du
NK121(ko)003:3614: mthong rtogs kyi rgyun de rgyud la ldan pa'i tshul
NK121(ko)003:3616: de dag gi skabs su byang phyogs dang phar phyin
NK121(ko)003:3617: drug sogs lam gyi yan lag mang bas lam de
NK121(ko)003:3618: gnyis la lam rnam byang gsungs /
NK121(ko)003:3619: mi slob pa'i sa ni sgrib gnyis dag pas dri med rnam byang ste 'dir 'phros don no //
NK121(ko)003:3620: gsum pa mthong ba'i lam la gnyis /
NK121(ko)003:3622: de skye ba'i rtags bstan pa'o //
NK121(ko)003:3624: chos thams cad rang rig tsam du mthong ba dang /
NK121(ko)003:3625: rang rig de ci la yang mi gnas par bstan pa'o //
NK121(ko)003:3628: 8 de ltar mos spyod du dpyod sgom dang 'jog
NK121(ko)003:3629: sgom ring du byas pa'i go ba mngon du gyur
NK121(ko)003:3630: pa'i tshe rig pa 'di ltar skye ste /
NK121(ko)003:3631: mthong lam mnyam bzhag ni chos dbyings kun tu 'gro ba'i don rtogs pa yin pas /
NK121(ko)003:3632: don gyi 'od gsal chos nyid spros bral de dang
NK121(ko)003:3633: gnyis su med pa rig stong rnam par mi rtog
NK121(ko)003:3634: pa'i ye shes mthong spang khams gsum gyi rtog pa
NK121(ko)003:3635: las grol zhing snying rje'i rlan dang ldan pa /
NK121(ko)003:3636: rtog med rnal 'byor mngon sum zhes kyang bya /
NK121(ko)003:3637: sgra rtog gi yul ma yin zhing gnyis snang nub pas /
NK121(ko)003:3638: yul yul can sogs kyi dgag bya'i spros pa ci
NK121(ko)003:3639: yang yod pa min pas chos nyid gcig tu zad
NK121(ko)003:3640: la / 'jug shes rten bcas kyi sgo lnga 'gag
NK121(ko)003:3641: par bshad kyang 'on long lta bu ma yin zhing
NK121(ko)003:3642: de la tha snyad btags pa rnams gzugs brnyan bzhin
NK121(ko)003:3643: la / du snang la / sems can rnams kyi
NK121(ko)003:3644: mngon sum gyi yul du snang bar gyur pa'i sangs
NK121(ko)003:3645: rgyas dang sems can la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams
NK121(ko)003:3646: rmi lam gyi yul snang bzhin du rnam par rtog
NK121(ko)003:3648: phyi nang kun la rang bzhin med par shes pa
NK121(ko)003:3649: ni dper na sgyu ma ngo shes pas dngos po
NK121(ko)003:3650: ci yang mthong ba med cing re dogs dang dgag
NK121(ko)003:3652: zhib tu dpyad na khyad par can gyi rnal 'byor
NK121(ko)003:3653: pa la yul snang mi 'gag cing tha snyad tsam
NK121(ko)003:3654: snang yang yod med sogs kyi dngos po ci yang
NK121(ko)003:3655: mi mthong zhing rig pa ye shes kyi gsal snang
NK121(ko)003:3657: rig pa de yang so so rang rig pa'i ye shes tsam du zad do //
NK121(ko)003:3658: 'di la mnyam bzhag snang med dang rjes thob snang
NK121(ko)003:3659: bcas ltar na mnyam bzhag tu sgo lnga'ang 'gag nas
NK121(ko)003:3660: kun rdzob kyang mi snang bar chos nyid 'ba' zhig
NK121(ko)003:3661: tu 'dod de / 'gog pa'i snyom 'jug bzhin no //
NK121(ko)003:3662: 'dir gzung 'dzin gyi rtogs pa sogs dgag bya'i snang
NK121(ko)003:3663: ba med pas snang med dang sgo lnga rtog med
NK121(ko)003:3664: la yul snang 'char ba snang bcas te mnyam bzhag
NK121(ko)003:3665: gcig gi rang ldog nas phye ba yin te /
NK121(ko)003:3666: yod med sogs rnam rtog mtshan ma kun dbyings su
NK121(ko)003:3667: nub pa'i chos nyid rig pa ro gcig tu mnyam
NK121(ko)003:3668: par bzhag tshe / phu btab nas yal 'gro ba'i
NK121(ko)003:3669: gzugs brnyan tsam gyi snang ba la 'gal ba med
NK121(ko)003:3670: par bzhag tshe / de / yul yul can gnyis ka stong gsal ro mnyam pa'i phyir /
NK121(ko)003:3672: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i chos rnams ni //
NK121(ko)003:3673: dam pa nyid du yod min zhing //
NK121(ko)003:3674: rang bzhin gsal ba nyid kyi phyir //
NK121(ko)003:3675: med pa nyid kyang ma yin no //
NK121(ko)003:3677: de ltar na ji lta ji snyed kyi ye shes gnyis kyang yod pa mi 'gal lo //
NK121(ko)003:3680: 7 dbyings rig mngon du gyur pa de'i tshe phyi
NK121(ko)003:3681: nang gi dngos po kun ci yang grub pa min
NK121(ko)003:3682: par mthong la / ci yang min pa de la'ang 'adi'o zhes bsam pa'i yul med de /
NK121(ko)003:3683: rnam shes la yul yod ye shes la yul med ces gsungs /
NK121(ko)003:3684: rig pa'i ye shes nyid yul chos kyi dbyings dang
NK121(ko)003:3685: chu la chu bzhag pa ltar ro gcig tu song
NK121(ko)003:3686: ba'i phyir / yul med pa de bas na sgra
NK121(ko)003:3687: rtog gam bsam brjod kyang mi 'jug kyang gnyis kyi
NK121(ko)003:3688: tshul du mthong ba'i snang ba med la /
NK121(ko)003:3689: ri bong la rwa gtan nas med pas de brjod
NK121(ko)003:3690: tshe r+aa'i sgra dang don gnyis ka med pa bzhin
NK121(ko)003:3691: du brjod par bya ba med pas rjod byed ming
NK121(ko)003:3692: btags pa tsam du yang mi mthong bas /
NK121(ko)003:3693: sems la tha dad du myong ba'am rig rgyu'i dngos po rdul tsam med par 'gyur ro //
NK121(ko)003:3695: brjod par bya ba ldog pa ste /
NK121(ko)003:3696: sems kyi spyod yul ldog pas so //
NK121(ko)003:3698: blo rig shes gsum don gcig pas rig pa ye shes la sems zhes rjod /
NK121(ko)003:3699: sems kyang dngos po med pa nam mkha' bzhin mthong
NK121(ko)003:3700: bas nam mkha' kun la khyab kyang gang la'ang mi
NK121(ko)003:3702: rig pa'i ye shes stong gsal 'dus ma byas pa
NK121(ko)003:3703: chos kyi dbyings la khyab kyang dngos po ci la
NK121(ko)003:3706: sems ni dmigs med bsam du yod ma yin //
NK121(ko)003:3707: rang bzhin dag cing ngo bo nyid kyis stong //
NK121(ko)003:3708: ye nas bdag med chos nyid zab mo ste //
NK121(ko)003:3709: nam mkha' bzhin du zab zhi spros dang bral //
NK121(ko)003:3711: 'o na ji snyed pa'i ye shes kyang de ltar
NK121(ko)003:3712: khyab bam snyam na lam pa dang sangs rgyas kyi
NK121(ko)003:3714: sho lo ka snga ma gnyis kas theg chen sems
NK121(ko)003:3715: tsam ltar chos thams cad rang rig tsam du mthong
NK121(ko)003:3716: ba dang / phyi ma rnams kyis dbu ma ltar
NK121(ko)003:3717: sems kyang rang bzhin med par mthong bas shes rab
NK121(ko)003:3718: kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo'o //
NK121(ko)003:3720: nang dang phyi yi skye mched la //
NK121(ko)003:3721: brten nas rnam par shes pa 'byung //
NK121(ko)003:3722: de lta bas na rnam shes med //
NK121(ko)003:3723: smig rgyu sgyu ma bzhin du stong //
NK121(ko)003:3725: gnyis pa mthong lam gyi rtags la gsum /
NK121(ko)003:3726: mnyam nyid mthong na chos sku mthong ba /
NK121(ko)003:3727: rnal 'byor pa dang sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa'i khyad par /
NK121(ko)003:3728: khyad par yod pa'i rtog pa spang dgos pa'o //
NK121(ko)003:3731: 8 chos kun chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam par rtogs
NK121(ko)003:3732: pa de'i tshe chos kun la blang dor du bya
NK121(ko)003:3733: ba mi mthong ba'i rtogs pa skye ste /
NK121(ko)003:3734: gang ltar na 'phags pa sangs rgyas dang sems can bdag dang gzhan dang bzang ngan dang dge sdig /
NK121(ko)003:3735: bde sdug gtsang sme spang blang la sogs pa gnyis
NK121(ko)003:3736: par snang ba kun don la gnyis su med par
NK121(ko)003:3737: rtogs pas / de dag ngo bo so sor yod
NK121(ko)003:3738: par mi mthong zhing tha dad pa'i 'du shes kyang
NK121(ko)003:3739: rtogs pas / mi 'jug go // bden gnyis dbyer med bzhin no //
NK121(ko)003:3740: de'i phyir gnyis chos thams cad gnyis med mnyam par
NK121(ko)003:3741: mthong zhing gnyis 'dzin gyi rtog pa mi 'jug pa
NK121(ko)003:3742: de ltar rtogs na chos kyi sku mthong ba yin
NK121(ko)003:3743: te / bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi ngo bo
NK121(ko)003:3744: ye shes 'dus ma byas pa chos kyi sku ste
NK121(ko)003:3745: dbyings dang ro gcig pa'i phyir ro //
NK121(ko)003:3747: rtag tu skye med chos ni de bzhin gshegs //
NK121(ko)003:3748: chos rnams thams cad de bzhin gshegs dang 'dra //
NK121(ko)003:3750: 'khor 'das thams cad chos dbyings tsam las khyad par med de /
NK121(ko)003:3751: 'khrul snang thams cad rang bzhin med par shes pa
NK121(ko)003:3752: las gzhan na chos sku bya ba med pa'i phyir
NK121(ko)003:3753: / 'di 'dra gsang sngags kyi skabs sam snyam na /
NK121(ko)003:3754: nges don gyi mdo rnams su chos thams cad la
NK121(ko)003:3755: ngo bo med pa rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las
NK121(ko)003:3756: 'das pa dang / rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba dang /
NK121(ko)003:3757: chos thams cad ye nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gsungs /
NK121(ko)003:3758: de'i don rtogs na bdag dang sangs rgyas khyad par
NK121(ko)003:3759: med pa'i blo 'byung ba ni shes rab khyad par
NK121(ko)003:3760: can yin / nam mkha' la sgyu ma'i sprul pa
NK121(ko)003:3761: snang ba dang nam mkha' la khyad par med pa
NK121(ko)003:3762: gzhan phung lnga sgyu ma tsam du snang ba'ang de
NK121(ko)003:3763: bzhin gshegs pa nyid yin par shes na lam gyi
NK121(ko)003:3764: mchog ste gzugs sku gnyis kyang sgyu ma lta bu
NK121(ko)003:3766: khyad par yod par mthong na theg pa chen po'i lam min par gsungs /
NK121(ko)003:3767: dri ma yod pas she na /
NK121(ko)003:3768: de gshis na med pa glo bur ba yin la
NK121(ko)003:3769: spang bya'i rdzas med cing gzhi ma grub pa smig
NK121(ko)003:3770: rgyu'i chu dang skra shad bzhin bri gang med pa
NK121(ko)003:3771: zad med skye med du 'dod pa yin no //
NK121(ko)003:3773: gang zhig bdag dang sangs rgyas rnams //
NK121(ko)003:3774: rang bzhin mnyam par rab gnas shing //
NK121(ko)003:3775: mi gnas len pa med pa de //
NK121(ko)003:3776: de dag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur //
NK121(ko)003:3777: gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang //
NK121(ko)003:3778: rnam par shes dang sems pa dag /
NK121(ko)003:3779: grangs med de bzhin gshegs pa rnams //
NK121(ko)003:3780: de dag thub pa chen por 'gyur //
NK121(ko)003:3782: nyon mongs pa la spang bya'i rdzas med cing 'khor
NK121(ko)003:3783: ba rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa de
NK121(ko)003:3784: lta na / sems can rnams gang gis bcings te 'khor bar 'khyams zhe na /
NK121(ko)003:3785: brtags na 'ching byed med kyang 'ching ba ltar snang ba ni rmi lam gyi sdug bsngal bzhin dang /
NK121(ko)003:3786: thag pa la sbrul du snang nas 'jigs pa dang
NK121(ko)003:3787: dug khong du ma song yang dogs pa'i 'du shes
NK121(ko)003:3789: sgyu ma la sgyu mar ma shes pas gnod pa'i
NK121(ko)003:3790: dpe yod pas yul la dngos po med kyang yod
NK121(ko)003:3791: par snang nas gnod pa yin no //
NK121(ko)003:3794: 4 rnal 'byor pa dang sangs rgyas gnyis chos dbyings la khyad med kyang /
NK121(ko)003:3795: dgongs pa mngon du gyur pa la khyad par yod dam zhe na yod do //
NK121(ko)003:3796: 'phags pa sangs rgyas dang lam pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i rtogs pa'i khyad par ni /
NK121(ko)003:3797: rnal 'byor pa rnams la ni yun ji srid du
NK121(ko)003:3798: mnyam par bzhag pa tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa'
NK121(ko)003:3799: des rtogs pa mngon du gyur nas rjes thob tu
NK121(ko)003:3801: sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa dgra bcom pa rnams kyi rtogs pa ni lhun gyis grub ste /
NK121(ko)003:3802: de'ang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni dgongs pa nam mkha'
NK121(ko)003:3803: lta bu'i ngang du 'jug ldang med par bzhugs pa'o
NK121(ko)003:3806: 6 de ltar sangs rgyas dang sems can gnyis rang
NK121(ko)003:3807: bzhin gcig mod kyang rnam par rtog pa yod med
NK121(ko)003:3808: kyi dbang gis khyad zhugs pas /
NK121(ko)003:3809: 'dus byas kyi chos la dngos por dmigs pa lta zhog /
NK121(ko)003:3810: tha na chos nyid kyi ngang la yod med mtshan
NK121(ko)003:3811: mar dmigs kyang rung rang sa'i sgrib pa yin la
NK121(ko)003:3813: rnam rtog ma rig chen po ste //
NK121(ko)003:3814: 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor ltung byed yin //
NK121(ko)003:3815: mi rtog ting 'dzin la gnas na //
NK121(ko)003:3816: mkha' bzhin dri ma med par 'gyur //
NK121(ko)003:3818: bzang rtog ngan rtog gang yang thams cad 'khor ba'i 'ching ba yin par blta ste /
NK121(ko)003:3820: ji ltar dug dang 'dres pa'i kha zas bzang za ba //
NK121(ko)003:3821: dkar po'i chos la dmigs pa'ang de 'drar rgyal bas gsungs //
NK121(ko)003:3823: k+aa ma shi la'i snang ba'i phreng ba las /
NK121(ko)003:3824: dam pa'i don gyi rtog pa la'ang //
NK121(ko)003:3825: mkhas pas der ni gnas mi bya //
NK121(ko)003:3826: dge ba'am mi dge ba yi yang //
NK121(ko)003:3827: rtog la bye brag ci zhig yod //
NK121(ko)003:3828: rten gyi dbye ba la brten pa'i //
NK121(ko)003:3829: me bsreg nyid du bye brag med //
NK121(ko)003:3830: tsan+dana gyi ni me yis kyang //
NK121(ko)003:3831: reg pa tsam gyis bsreg pa nyid //
NK121(ko)003:3832: rnam par rtog pa chung ngu yang //
NK121(ko)003:3833: thams cad du ni spang bar bya //
NK121(ko)003:3835: dang po dpyad pa'i dus rang bzhin med do snyam
NK121(ko)003:3836: pa la mi bya ste rang bzhin med pa la
NK121(ko)003:3838: chos nyid mngon du gyur pa la rtog ge'i dpyod par byed pa lta bu la bya'o //
NK121(ko)003:3840: gang zhig rtog ge'i lam nas chos nyid la khrid na //
NK121(ko)003:3841: thub pa'i bstan las ches bsring nyams par byas pa yin //
NK121(ko)003:3843: nges shes kyi yul la 'dzin stangs kyis bcings pa rang sa'i sgrib pa yin par bshad do //
NK121(ko)003:3844: de bas na rnam par mi rtog pa bsam brjod
NK121(ko)003:3845: las 'das pa rang rig 'od gsal chos sku nyag
NK121(ko)003:3846: gcig tu bas te zad pas /
NK121(ko)003:3847: rnam rtog spang zhing mi rtog pa'i ye shes rang
NK121(ko)003:3848: rig nyid 'thob par bya ba'i phyir 'bad par bya'o
NK121(ko)003:3849: // rig pa stong gsal 'dzin med du bzhag pas re dogs dang gegs thams cad sel te /
NK121(ko)003:3851: gang la zhen pa yod na de yang thongs //
NK121(ko)003:3852: rtogs par gyur na thams cad de yin te //
NK121(ko)003:3854: bzhi pa sgom pa'i lam la gsum /
NK121(ko)003:3855: sgom lam bshad par dam bca' ba dang /
NK121(ko)003:3859: lta ba rtogs pa de'i rgyun sgom tshe 'di ltar
NK121(ko)003:3860: rnam rtog thams cad spang zhing zhi lhag zung 'brel
NK121(ko)003:3861: gyi ngang la rtse gcig tu bzhag par bya'o //
NK121(ko)003:3863: chos nyid bsam du med par bzhag pa dang /
NK121(ko)003:3864: lus sems khong klod de rtog med btang snyoms la brtson pa dang /
NK121(ko)003:3865: rtog pa phra rags byung na thabs dang shes rab kyis dgag sgrub med par 'jog pa dang /
NK121(ko)003:3866: dran shes rgyun gyis glo bur yul la zhen rtog byung na brtags nas nang du 'jog pa dang /
NK121(ko)003:3867: de ltar goms pa'i nyams gsum 'byung ba dang /
NK121(ko)003:3871: 3 'di ltar srid pa 'khor ba dang zhi ba
NK121(ko)003:3872: mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos su snang ba 'di
NK121(ko)003:3873: rnams ni yod med la sogs pa gang du'ang ma
NK121(ko)003:3874: grub pa gtan la phab zin pa'i phyir /
NK121(ko)003:3875: yul ci yang yod pa min pas yul can ci
NK121(ko)003:3876: yang bsam du med pa'i ngang la rang bab tu
NK121(ko)003:3877: 'jog pa ste / don 'di gang yin nam mkha' dag la blta bar gyis /
NK121(ko)003:3879: dpal ldan zla bas dbu ma shes rab la 'jug par /
NK121(ko)003:3880: ye nas skye med ngang nyid las //
NK121(ko)003:3881: dgag bya med la bsgrub bya med //
NK121(ko)003:3883: skye med ngang du khyad par med //
NK121(ko)003:3884: ces pa'i don la rtog pa med pa'i blo rang zhir 'jog par gsungs /
NK121(ko)003:3886: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bsgom pa ni nam mkha' bsgom pa lags so //
NK121(ko)003:3890: 6 gnyis chos thams cad gnyis med du shes nas
NK121(ko)003:3891: spang blang gi rtsol ba ngang gis zhi ba la
NK121(ko)003:3892: dran pa nye bar 'jog pa tsam la sgom zhes
NK121(ko)003:3893: tha snyad 'dogs dgos pa de'i tshe /
NK121(ko)003:3894: yid kyis bsam du med pas yul ci la yang
NK121(ko)003:3895: mi bsam zhing gzung 'dzin gyi 'ching ba lhod dgos
NK121(ko)003:3896: pa ste / skye med rin po che'i mdzod las /
NK121(ko)003:3897: gang yang ma rtog cir yang ma sems shig /
NK121(ko)003:3898: bcas bcos ma byed rang bab lhug par zhog /
NK121(ko)003:3899: ma bcos pa de skye med rin chen mdzod //
NK121(ko)003:3900: dus gsum rgyal ba rnams kyi gshegs shul yin //
NK121(ko)003:3902: sems 'jog thabs mang po'i 'bad rtsol dang /
NK121(ko)003:3903: bsam gtan sems 'dzin gyi byed pa ltar gtad pa la 'dzin pa'i dmigs pa kun spangs nas /
NK121(ko)003:3904: ci yang mi bsam mo snyam pa dang rnam par
NK121(ko)003:3905: mi rtog pa tsam la'ang mi rtog go snyam du
NK121(ko)003:3906: mi gnas par / ha cang bsdoms ches pa'i lus
NK121(ko)003:3907: sems khong klod de bsgrim lhod ran pa gyi na
NK121(ko)003:3908: mi gnas par / tsam du / rkyen gyis mi
NK121(ko)003:3909: g.yo zhing ngo bo stong la gdangs gsal ba'i ngang
NK121(ko)003:3910: la rang bab tu bzhag pa ste /
NK121(ko)003:3911: sngon gro bzhin skyes kyis sgom bslab pa ltar grim lhod gnyis ka'i cha yod par byas te /
NK121(ko)003:3912: yul snang sgyu ma lta bu la spang blang dang
NK121(ko)003:3913: re dogs sogs 'du byed kyi rtog pa med par
NK121(ko)003:3914: btang snyoms chen po'i gnas la yun ring du brtson
NK121(ko)003:3917: bsam gtan bsgrub la brtson par bya //
NK121(ko)003:3918: yang dang yang du ngal bsos na //
NK121(ko)003:3920: rnal 'byor tshul la'ang de bzhin te //
NK121(ko)003:3921: khyad par ma thob btang mi bya //
NK121(ko)003:3923: gtsub shing gtsub pa ltar dum re dum re bsgom
NK121(ko)003:3924: nas bzhag pa'i snga phyi thams cad bsdoms pas ni
NK121(ko)003:3928: bag chags kyi 'khrul snang dang 'du byed kyi rtog
NK121(ko)003:3929: pa gang shar gyi ngo bo chos nyid yin par
NK121(ko)003:3930: shes na spang bya med cing /
NK121(ko)003:3931: 'bras bu tshogs drug gi yul la rnam rtog byung
NK121(ko)003:3932: tshe ngos zin na rang byung yin pas rang zhir
NK121(ko)003:3933: 'gro zhing rang shar rang grol du bzhag go //
NK121(ko)003:3934: de yang dman lam ltar spang byar bzung nas mi
NK121(ko)003:3935: dgag byang sems ltar rkyen rtsol gyis bcos bsgyur mi
NK121(ko)003:3936: byed / phal pa ltar rjes su mi 'brang bar rang gi ngang gis gsal bar bzhag go //
NK121(ko)003:3937: de dag gi tshe 'og 'gyu'i rnam par rtog pa
NK121(ko)003:3938: shin tu phra ba'ang mi mngon par rgyu ba rkun
NK121(ko)003:3939: bu ltar ngo shes par bya /
NK121(ko)003:3940: bar bar du sems sems byung lhan cig yin pa
NK121(ko)003:3941: mdo las kyang gsungs pas sems kyis sems kyang ci
NK121(ko)003:3943: sems 'thum ste bying na sdug bsngal la skyo zhing
NK121(ko)003:3944: sku gzugs sogs yid byed kyis sems gzeng bstod cing
NK121(ko)003:3945: gseng bar bya / yul la rnam par 'phro ba'i
NK121(ko)003:3946: rgod pa byung na 'khor ba las yid 'byung ste
NK121(ko)003:3947: myang 'das la spro ba skyed pas sems nang du
NK121(ko)003:3948: gseng bar bya / 'adu'o // yang na rgod pa'i gnyen po btang snyoms kyis mgo gnon par bya'o //
NK121(ko)003:3949: de ltar sgom tshe yul snang 'di ldog gam snyam
NK121(ko)003:3950: na bshad ma thag pa ltar mi ldog kyang snang
NK121(ko)003:3951: ba mi 'gog pa ni thabs yin te /
NK121(ko)003:3952: snang tsam las med par shes pa ni bsod nams
NK121(ko)003:3953: kyi tshogs su 'gyur zhing des 'ching bar yang mi
NK121(ko)003:3954: nus te de la zhen pas 'ching ba yin la
NK121(ko)003:3955: / snang ba ma log kyang dngos po dang mkhyen
NK121(ko)003:3956: rtog ldog dgos pas snang ba la bden par mi
NK121(ko)003:3957: 'dzin cing zhen nas mi gnas pa ni shes rab
NK121(ko)003:3958: / yin no // dpyad pa'i tshe lta bas snang
NK121(ko)003:3959: ba'i thog tu spros pa bcad pa yin gyi snang
NK121(ko)003:3960: ba dgag pa min te gzugs med khams dang 'dra
NK121(ko)003:3961: / yin no // ba'i phyir / ji skad du /
NK121(ko)003:3963: mkhas pa de yis yongs su grol //
NK121(ko)003:3965: gnas lugs ma goms bar du mtshan mas sems kyang
NK121(ko)003:3966: sbyangs zhes pa dge ba'i mtshan mas sems sbyangs pa
NK121(ko)003:3967: yin 'dra bas / blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa las /
NK121(ko)003:3968: lus dang ngag rnams dang ni yid bsdoms shing //
NK121(ko)003:3969: rnam par dag pa'i las lam bcu la slob //
NK121(ko)003:3970: byams pas sems can kun la yang dag blta //
NK121(ko)003:3971: 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin //
NK121(ko)003:3972: snying rje ldan pas gzhan gyi bya bar brtson //
NK121(ko)003:3973: dga' dang ldan pas chos la pha rol sbyor //
NK121(ko)003:3974: btang snyoms ldan pas chos mchog 'tshe ba med //
NK121(ko)003:3975: 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems spyod yin //
NK121(ko)003:3976: zhes sogs mang du gsungs pa ltar /
NK121(ko)003:3977: mtshan ma'i sems sbyangs ltar ni skabs su sbyangs bzhin pa'o //
NK121(ko)003:3978: gtso cher chos nyid kyi don kho na la bsam
NK121(ko)003:3979: zhing gtong 'dzin kyang byas yang na sems kyis sems
NK121(ko)003:3980: nyid kyi ngo bo la blta bar bya /
NK121(ko)003:3981: yang na sgo lnga'i yul gyi gzugs sogs snang la
NK121(ko)003:3982: rang bzhin med par stong pa nyid du ni bsam
NK121(ko)003:3983: zhing gsal la mtshan ma'i rtog pa med par bzhag
NK121(ko)003:3986: 3 nang du yang dag par 'jog tshe rgyun mi
NK121(ko)003:3987: brjed pa'i dran pa dang shes bzhin ni shes rab
NK121(ko)003:3988: dang 'dra zhing / sngar bshad pa ltar bying na
NK121(ko)003:3989: bying ngo zhes shes rgod na rgod ngo zhes sogs
NK121(ko)003:3990: bya ra bas bsrung zhing bskyangs la /
NK121(ko)003:3991: gal te brjed ngas lta bus bying rgod kyi skyon
NK121(ko)003:3992: byung na brtson 'grus dang sems pa sogs thabs sna
NK121(ko)003:3993: tshogs kyis rtsol bas yang nas yang du mnyam par
NK121(ko)003:3994: bzhag go // las dang po pa yin na sems byung dran pa 'di gal che ste /
NK121(ko)003:3995: gnas lugs dran pas zin pa dang rnam rtog ma rig pa 'gags pa dus mnyam yin pa'i phyir /
NK121(ko)003:3997: yungs mar bkang ba'i snod bskur la //
NK121(ko)003:3998: ral gri thogs pas drung bsdad de //
NK121(ko)003:3999: bo na gsod bsdigs 'jigs pa ltar //
NK121(ko)003:4000: brtul zhugs can gyis de bzhin bsgrim //
NK121(ko)003:4002: mthar dran rtog ye shes su song dbyings rig 'od
NK121(ko)003:4003: gsal du 'dres nas nyin mtshan gyi cha med tshe
NK121(ko)003:4004: 'du byed kyi dran pa med de /
NK121(ko)003:4006: rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
NK121(ko)003:4007: ni dran pa med cing yid la byar med pa'i
NK121(ko)003:4010: yang glo bur du tshogs drug gi yul la dngos
NK121(ko)003:4011: por zhen pa'i rtog pa byung na yul de blos
NK121(ko)003:4012: gzhig cing brtags nas dngos med du byas na /
NK121(ko)003:4013: 'khrul snang stong nas sems ting nge 'dzin du zhi bar 'gyur ro //
NK121(ko)003:4014: zhes 'grel kyang rung ngam snyam mo //
NK121(ko)003:4017: 4 de ltar rgyun bsring nas bsgom na sems nyams rnam pa gsum yang 'byung ste /
NK121(ko)003:4018: dang po g.yo ba'i nyams ri gzar gyi 'bab chu
NK121(ko)003:4019: drag po chu len gyis 'gog dka' ba dang 'dra
NK121(ko)003:4020: ba / sems kyi ngo bo 'gag cing rnam par
NK121(ko)003:4021: rtog pa bzlog dka' ba ste sems gnas pa'i mgo
NK121(ko)003:4023: gnyis pa cung zad goms pa'i nyams shin tu dal
NK121(ko)003:4024: bar 'bab pa'i chu klung du rde'u phra mo mthong
NK121(ko)003:4025: ba bzhin / rnam rtog phra mo mthong ba'i shes pa gsal zhing dwangs par 'gyur /
NK121(ko)003:4026: gsum pa brtan pa'i nyams mtshan rtog gis mi g.yo
NK121(ko)003:4027: zhing rab tu gsal ba rgya mtsho rlabs dang bral
NK121(ko)003:4029: de nas btang snyoms gsum yang rim gyis 'byung /
NK121(ko)003:4030: zhes pa 'di spyir btang snyoms ni sems mnyam par 'dug pa ste /
NK121(ko)003:4031: dgag sgrub phyogs kyi cha gnyis btang nas sems rnal du 'dug pa la bya /
NK121(ko)003:4032: khyad par sems bying rgod kyi dbang du mi gtong
NK121(ko)003:4033: bar lhun grub tu 'byung ba'i nyon mongs pas skabs
NK121(ko)003:4034: mi 'byed pa'i las can gyi btang snyoms te /
NK121(ko)003:4036: 'du byed btang snyoms tshor ba btang snyoms /
NK121(ko)003:4037: tshad med btang snyoms dang gsum la 'grel na'ang chog gam snyam ste /
NK121(ko)003:4038: chos thams cad gnyis med mnyam par bltas te btang snyoms chen por 'jog pas so //
NK121(ko)003:4039: 'on kyang rtsa bar rim gyis 'byung zhes pa'i tshig
NK121(ko)003:4040: zur las btang snyoms chung 'bring che gsum yin par
NK121(ko)003:4041: 'dra zhing / rtsa ba'i mtshan rnying la 'bad rtsol
NK121(ko)003:4042: gyis bying rgod mgo non pas sems mi g.yo ba
NK121(ko)003:4043: dang rnal du pheb pa dang bying rgod med par
NK121(ko)003:4044: lhun grub tu gnas pa gsum la bshad par snang
NK121(ko)003:4045: 'dra zhing / ngo // 'dir dbus mtha' las bshad
NK121(ko)003:4046: pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor ba'i sgrib pa le
NK121(ko)003:4047: lo dang gdams ngag brjed pa gnyis /
NK121(ko)003:4048: dngos gzhi'i sgrib pa bying rgod dang /
NK121(ko)003:4049: bsam gtan gyi sgrib pa bying rgod sogs byung ba
NK121(ko)003:4050: na so so'i gnyen po'i tshul bzhin du 'du byed
NK121(ko)003:4051: dgos pa la de ltar 'du mi byed pa dang
NK121(ko)003:4052: / bying rgod zhi yang da dung 'du byed che
NK121(ko)003:4053: na des g.yo ba'i sems mi bstan pa ste de
NK121(ko)003:4054: gnyis ni ting nge 'dzin gong 'phel du 'gro ba'i
NK121(ko)003:4056: des na le lo dang gdams ngag brjed pa dang
NK121(ko)003:4057: bying rgod dang 'du mi byed pa dang 'du byed
NK121(ko)003:4059: de la dad 'dun rtsol ba shin sbyangs bzhis le lo spong ba dang /
NK121(ko)003:4060: de bzhin du dran pa shes bzhin sems pa btang
NK121(ko)003:4061: snyoms bzhi las dran pas gdams ngag gi dmigs rnams
NK121(ko)003:4063: shes bzhin gyis bying rgod byung ba rtogs pa dang
NK121(ko)003:4064: sems pa ni yul gyi rnam pa nang du sems
NK121(ko)003:4065: pa yin pas bying rgod kyii nyes pa de spang
NK121(ko)003:4066: ba'i gnyen po mngon par 'du byed pa dang /
NK121(ko)003:4067: btang snyoms kyis bying rgod zhi tshe sems rnal du 'dug pa ste /
NK121(ko)003:4068: sems mnyam par bzhag pa'i tshe rtsol na g.yeng bar 'gyur la /
NK121(ko)003:4069: bying ba'i tshe rtsol na lhag mthong med pas long ba lta bur 'gyur ro //
NK121(ko)003:4070: 'di rnams gal che bar 'dug pas bris so //
NK121(ko)003:4071: de ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi spang gnyen la 'bad
NK121(ko)003:4072: nas goms pa de'i tshe lus sems las su rung
NK121(ko)003:4073: ba'i shin tu sbyangs pa ste dbang shes 'khor gyi
NK121(ko)003:4074: bde ba dang yid shes 'khor gyi bde ba thob
NK121(ko)003:4075: ste / lus sems kyi gnas ngan len thams cad
NK121(ko)003:4076: 'joms par byed cing bde ba chen po 'dren par
NK121(ko)003:4077: ste / byed do // dran nye las /
NK121(ko)003:4078: sems dang dbang po rab zhi ba //
NK121(ko)003:4079: rnal 'byor snying la dga' ba gang //
NK121(ko)003:4080: de ni brgya byin stong snyed kyis //
NK121(ko)003:4081: shin tu dga' bar mi 'gyur ro //
NK121(ko)003:4085: 10 de ltar stong pa nyid la yun ring du
NK121(ko)003:4086: goms tshe shes nyams 'phel 'grib can dang dus min
NK121(ko)003:4087: glo bur du 'byung ba bar chad bdud kyi rtags
NK121(ko)003:4088: ma yin par / nges pa'i rtags kyang 'di ltar
NK121(ko)003:4089: 'byung ste dngos po kun la mtshan mar 'dzin cing
NK121(ko)003:4090: so sor 'byed par byed pa'i log rtog gi 'du
NK121(ko)003:4091: shes chung zhing zhi bar gyur nas /
NK121(ko)003:4092: chags sdang dang la sogs pa'i rtsa ba dang nye
NK121(ko)003:4093: ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams je chung ngu 'gyur zhing
NK121(ko)003:4094: / dge sdig dang bdag gzhan 'khor 'das sogs kyi
NK121(ko)003:4095: gnyis snang thams cad je mnyam je mnyam du rtogs
NK121(ko)003:4096: / pa dang / gnas tshul la mnyam yang de
NK121(ko)003:4097: ltar ma rtogs pa'i snang tshul glo bur gyi dri
NK121(ko)003:4098: ma can rnams la snying rje dang phan 'dogs pa'i
NK121(ko)003:4099: sems je 'phel je 'phel du 'gyur ba dang /
NK121(ko)003:4100: mthong snang gi yul rnams ni sems rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags tsam yin pas /
NK121(ko)003:4101: sems kyi rtog pa je phrar song ba dang mthong
NK121(ko)003:4102: snang 'khrul ba'i dngos po rnams med par 'gyur la
NK121(ko)003:4103: / mngon shes lnga dang spyan lnga la sogs pa
NK121(ko)003:4104: lam rtags kyi yon tan rnams kyang mthun pa'i rgyu
NK121(ko)003:4107: rjes su 'gro dang ldog pa las //
NK121(ko)003:4108: gang zhig gang gi rjes 'gro mthong //
NK121(ko)003:4109: phan tshun rang gzhan de rgyu can //
NK121(ko)003:4110: de phyir mi mthun las mi 'byung //
NK121(ko)003:4112: de ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu dag /
NK121(ko)003:4113: phan tshun rang gzhan nges pa nyid //
NK121(ko)003:4115: mi bslu ba'i yon tan ma byung bar du gong
NK121(ko)003:4116: du bshad pa'i rtags dang ci mthun bya dgos kyi
NK121(ko)003:4117: / ting nge 'dzin dang mngon shes sogs glo bur du 'byung ba ma nges pa yod pa'i phyir /
NK121(ko)003:4120: de ltar stong pa nyid 'di ni //
NK121(ko)003:4121: rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom byas nas //
NK121(ko)003:4122: gzhan gyi don la chags pa'i blo //
NK121(ko)003:4125: gsum pa rjes thob la gsum /
NK121(ko)003:4126: thun mong gi dge ba ci 'grub byed pa /
NK121(ko)003:4127: bdag bstod gzhan smod kyi bdud las spong ba //
NK121(ko)003:4128: de ltar byas pas tshogs gnyis rdzogs par bstan pa'o //
NK121(ko)003:4131: 10 de ltar stong pa nyid la sems mnyam par
NK121(ko)003:4132: bzhag pa ni 'dzin pa'i rtog pa dang gzung ba'i
NK121(ko)003:4134: blo dang blos bzhag gi spros pa thams cad rnam
NK121(ko)003:4135: par bcad pa'i shugs las bden pa mthong zhes tha
NK121(ko)003:4136: snyad btags kyi yongs gcod kyis 'grub pa min te
NK121(ko)003:4137: / mthong zhes pa ni chos gang yang ma mthong ba'i tshig bla dwags te /
NK121(ko)003:4138: dri ma med par grags pa'i mdo las /
NK121(ko)003:4139: bden pa mthong ba rnams kyis bden pa nyid mthong ba med na rdzun pa lta ga la mthong /
NK121(ko)003:4142: don 'di gang yin nam mkha' dag la blta bar gyis /
NK121(ko)003:4144: des na mthong bya mthong byed med pa nam mkha'
NK121(ko)003:4145: lta bu'i ngang nas rjes thob tu langs tshe spyod
NK121(ko)003:4147: chos can thams cad rang bzhin stong pa nyid du
NK121(ko)003:4148: rtogs mod kyang dper na rmi lam nyid na'ang rgyu
NK121(ko)003:4149: 'bras mi bslu ba ltar snang ba bzhin /
NK121(ko)003:4150: 'khrul rtog ma zad bar du las dang las kyi
NK121(ko)003:4151: 'bras bu myong ba yod pas dge sdig gi las
NK121(ko)003:4152: la rtag tu spang blang bya /
NK121(ko)003:4153: sdig pa byas pa rnams dang po stobs bzhis bshags par bya ste /
NK121(ko)003:4155: chos bzhi bstan pa'i mdo las /
NK121(ko)003:4156: byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan
NK121(ko)003:4157: na sdig pa'i las byas shing bsags pa thams cad
NK121(ko)003:4161: byang chub kyi sems la bsten pa dang /
NK121(ko)003:4166: shin tu mi bzad las rnams byas pa ni //
NK121(ko)003:4167: bdag la rnam par smod pas bsrab par 'gyur //
NK121(ko)003:4168: rab tu bshags dang sdom par byed pa yis //
NK121(ko)003:4169: de dag shin tu rtsad nas bton pa bzhin //
NK121(ko)003:4171: de'i rjes su bshags bya bshags byed mi dmigs pa
NK121(ko)003:4172: sems nyid 'khor gsum dag pa'i ngang du bzhag nas
NK121(ko)003:4173: sbyangs / spang gnyen la sogs pa'i re dogs thams
NK121(ko)003:4174: cad chos kyi dbyings su mnyam pa nyid gdeng du
NK121(ko)003:4175: gyur na sdig dang bsod nams las 'das pa thar
NK121(ko)003:4176: ba yin pas rtags dang sbyar nas mthun par byung
NK121(ko)003:4177: sbyangs / na / dgos pa'i dbang ma gtogs spros
NK121(ko)003:4178: pa dor bar bya ste chu la brgal tshe gzings
NK121(ko)003:4179: dgos kyi brgal nas skam la phyin tshe gzings dgos
NK121(ko)003:4180: sbyangs / na / pa med do // gang ltar
NK121(ko)003:4181: yang 'khor 'das kyi chos dngos por snang ba kun
NK121(ko)003:4182: sgyu ma dang 'dra bas sgyu ma'i sprul pa bzhin
NK121(ko)003:4183: du dbyer med par blta ste /
NK121(ko)003:4184: brgyad stong dang lha'i bus zhus pa rnams su sems
NK121(ko)003:4185: can nas sangs rgyas kyi bar du chos thams cad
NK121(ko)003:4186: rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu gnyis su
NK121(ko)003:4187: med gnyis su byar med sogs gsungs /
NK121(ko)003:4188: de'ang sems can la las kyi sgyu ma /
NK121(ko)003:4189: rnal 'byor pa la nyams kyi sgyu ma /
NK121(ko)003:4190: sangs rgyas la dag pa'i sgyu ma zhes gnyis med rnam rgyal las bshad /
NK121(ko)003:4191: sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos zhus pa las /
NK121(ko)003:4192: las kyis sprul pa'i sgyu ma ni //
NK121(ko)003:4193: 'gro drug sems can thams cad do //
NK121(ko)003:4194: rkyen gyis sprul pa'i sgyu ma ni //
NK121(ko)003:4195: me long gzugs brnyan la sogs so //
NK121(ko)003:4196: chos kyis sprul pa'i sgyu ma ni //
NK121(ko)003:4197: nga yi 'khor gyi dge slong ngo //
NK121(ko)003:4198: nga ni yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas //
NK121(ko)003:4199: ye shes sprul pa'i sgyu ma'o //
NK121(ko)003:4201: sgyu ma dang sprul pa la dngos po med pas don byed nus sam snyam na /
NK121(ko)003:4202: sgyu ma'i dmag ngo ma shes pas mgron po mang po la gnod pa dang /
NK121(ko)003:4204: sprul pa'i dge slong gnyis kyis dge slong dmigs lta can lnga brgya btul ba sogs mang du yod /
NK121(ko)003:4206: gang tshe bder gshegs gtam rnams ston pa na //
NK121(ko)003:4207: mgon po srang bzhud mi la thugs brtse'i phyir //
NK121(ko)003:4208: rgyal bas der ni sprul pa rnams sprul te //
NK121(ko)003:4209: de dag la yang sangs rgyas chos bzang ston //
NK121(ko)003:4211: de'i phyir dge sbyor thams cad byed par snang yang bden par mi dmigs bzhin du spyad /
NK121(ko)003:4213: shing mkhan bzo bo mkhas pas skyes pa bud med dang //
NK121(ko)003:4214: 'dra ba'i bzo byas de yang bya ba thams cad byed //
NK121(ko)003:4215: de bzhin shes rab spyod mkhas byang chub sems dpa' yang //
NK121(ko)003:4216: rnam par mi rtog ye shes bya ba thams cad byed //
NK121(ko)003:4218: sleb sar ma phyin bar du lam mkhan dgos pa bzhin /
NK121(ko)003:4219: rtag tu dran shes bzhin dang mi 'bral bar sgom gyi gdeng ci zin bya ste /
NK121(ko)003:4220: lam la skyed thon dgos pa'i phyir dang /
NK121(ko)003:4221: spyod pas la dor dgos pas 'dus byas kyi dge
NK121(ko)003:4222: ba dman par bltas nas mi dgag par nus tshad
NK121(ko)003:4223: bya / skabs su nyon mongs pa skyes na smig
NK121(ko)003:4224: rgyu bzhin du bcos med du 'jog gam gnyen po
NK121(ko)003:4225: stong nyid bsgom pa'i ngang du zhi bar bya /
NK121(ko)003:4227: stong la 'dod chags bral ba med //
NK121(ko)003:4228: stong la kun nas nyon mongs med //
NK121(ko)003:4229: rtag tu stong dben bsgom pas na //
NK121(ko)003:4230: sgrib pa rnams ni spong bar byed //
NK121(ko)003:4232: dgon par 'dug mi spro bar skyon mi rtag pa
NK121(ko)003:4233: dang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsams nas sdod tshugs par
NK121(ko)003:4234: bya / dus gsum gyi 'phags pa rnams mngon sum du bzhugs par bsam la /
NK121(ko)003:4235: bzang spyod las byung ba lta bu'i yan lag bdun pa rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis bya /
NK121(ko)003:4236: des mtshon nas dus gsum gyi dge rtsa ci byas
NK121(ko)003:4237: thams cad gzhan don du byang chub chen por bsngo
NK121(ko)003:4240: rtog med blo ni rang zhir bzhag /
NK121(ko)003:4241: ngos bzung med cing yeng ba med //
NK121(ko)003:4242: mtshan ma med cing gsal bar bsgom //
NK121(ko)003:4243: langs la dngos por snang ba kun //
NK121(ko)003:4244: sgyu ma tsam du shes byas nas //
NK121(ko)003:4245: sdom pa rnam gsum 'bad pas bsrung //
NK121(ko)003:4246: yan lag bdun pa la sogs bya //
NK121(ko)003:4247: snying rje phan sems che bar bya //
NK121(ko)003:4248: yul la chags pa spang bya zhing //
NK121(ko)003:4249: mgron po'i tshul gyis gnas par bya //
NK121(ko)003:4253: 12 theg pa chen po'i lam gyi rtsa ba sems
NK121(ko)003:4254: can rnams la snying rje dang phan 'dod kyi sems
NK121(ko)003:4257: sems can khams ni tshad med la //
NK121(ko)003:4260: byams pa'i lus kyi las khro gnyer dang ngo 'dzum
NK121(ko)003:4261: gnag pa spangs la rtag tu 'dzum pa'i bzhin du
NK121(ko)003:4262: bya / zla ba sgron me'i mdor /
NK121(ko)003:4263: zla rgyas bzhin 'dzum dul ba dang //
NK121(ko)003:4264: rgan rabs dang ni gsar bu la'ang //
NK121(ko)003:4265: rtag tu gsang por smra ba dang //
NK121(ko)003:4266: des shing nga rgyal med par bya //
NK121(ko)003:4268: sgo gsum zhi zhing dul ba dang kun la drang
NK121(ko)003:4269: po'am gsang por zhes rgyab dang g.yas g.yon min par
NK121(ko)003:4270: mdun nas legs par smra ba dang /
NK121(ko)003:4271: ha cang brel ba bskyung bar bya ba dang /
NK121(ko)003:4272: bdag la mi bstod cing rang skyon la blta bar
NK121(ko)003:4273: bya zhing gzhan la mi smod par yon tan can
NK121(ko)003:4274: du blta zhing basngagasa par bya /
NK121(ko)003:4276: bdag stod gzhan la smod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni //
NK121(ko)003:4277: bdud kyis yongs su bzung zhing blo chung rig par bya //
NK121(ko)003:4279: rang la snyan grags byung ba bdud kyi las yin zhing sems g.yeng bar 'gyur bas /
NK121(ko)003:4280: ma legs so snyam ste mi dga' bar bya'o //
NK121(ko)003:4281: mi chos bla ma bden pa mngon shes sogs gong
NK121(ko)003:4282: ma'i yon tan thob kyang gzhan la mi bsgrags pa
NK121(ko)003:4283: yin na / mi ma yin pa'i gzugs mthong sgra
NK121(ko)003:4284: thos la sogs pa don med pa de mi bsgrags
NK121(ko)003:4286: ma mthong bzhin du mthong zhes smra ba ni mi chos bla ma'i rdzun du 'gyur zhing /
NK121(ko)003:4287: mthong na'ang de 'dra 'jig rten phal pa la'ang yod
NK121(ko)003:4288: pas de lam gyi yon tan du rlom nas gzhan
NK121(ko)003:4289: la smras na mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang /
NK121(ko)003:4290: gzhan gyis khyad par can du mos nas rnyed bkur 'du bas lam las nyams par 'gyur ro //
NK121(ko)003:4291: gzhan yang dpung bzang dang bshes spring sogs las bshad
NK121(ko)003:4292: pa'i snyan cing grags pa la re zhing dga' ba
NK121(ko)003:4293: dang / mi snyan pa ma grags pa la dogs shing mi dga' ba dang /
NK121(ko)003:4294: de bzhin du sbyar te ngor bstod pa dang lkog
NK121(ko)003:4295: tu smad pa dang nad med pa sogs kyi bde
NK121(ko)003:4296: ba dang de las bzlog pa'i sdug bsngal ba dang
NK121(ko)003:4297: / longs spyod kyi rnyed pa dang de ma rnyed
NK121(ko)003:4298: pa de rnams la dga' mi dga' re dogs byed
NK121(ko)003:4299: pas g.yeng ba ni 'jig rten phal pa rnams dang
NK121(ko)003:4301: de brgyad por 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thob
NK121(ko)003:4302: par 'dod pa rnams kyis snying po med pa brag
NK121(ko)003:4303: cha dang rmi lam 'dra bar mgo mnyam par bya'o
NK121(ko)003:4305: bcos min snyan par grags pa'i yon tan gyis //
NK121(ko)003:4306: 'gro ba mgu bar nus pa'i mthu ldan na //
NK121(ko)003:4307: yon tan bcos ma'i bkur sti thob pa rnams //
NK121(ko)003:4308: mi bzad phrag dog me ni 'bar bar 'gyur //
NK121(ko)003:4311: lta gyur 'ching dang rnyed dang bkur sti dang //
NK121(ko)003:4312: grags pa'i 'ching ba rab tu byung ba yi //
NK121(ko)003:4313: 'ching ba dam zhes 'phags pa rnams kyis gsungs //
NK121(ko)003:4314: de dag rtag tu rab tu byung bas spang //
NK121(ko)003:4316: sems can rnams ni las dang nyon mongs pa'i skyon
NK121(ko)003:4317: gyi rang bzhin yin pas byis pas byis pa gzhan
NK121(ko)003:4318: gyi skyon la mi brtag go //
NK121(ko)003:4319: zhes pa 'dra ste 'phags pas gzhan skyon mi brtag pas so //
NK121(ko)003:4321: bdag gis skyon rnams 'chab byed cing //
NK121(ko)003:4322: gzhan gyi nyes la rtogs par byed //
NK121(ko)003:4324: mkhas pa rnams kyis rma 'di spongs //
NK121(ko)003:4326: yang na bcom ldan 'das kyis nga dang nga 'dra
NK121(ko)003:4327: ba ma gtogs gang zag gis gang zag gi tshod
NK121(ko)003:4328: bzung bar mi bya zhes gsungs shing /
NK121(ko)003:4329: mdog ngan glen nam yang na rnyed med dam //
NK121(ko)003:4330: brnyas shing smad par bya ba yin na yang //
NK121(ko)003:4331: mi yi khams dang spyod pa shes dka' bas //
NK121(ko)003:4332: de la gya tshom skyon ni gdags mi bya //
NK121(ko)003:4334: nges pa dang ma nges par 'gro ba'i mdor //
NK121(ko)003:4335: gang gi 'khrul ba ci mthong yang //
NK121(ko)003:4336: de dag la ni nyes mi brjod //
NK121(ko)003:4337: ci 'dra ba yi las byas na //
NK121(ko)003:4340: blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa las /
NK121(ko)003:4341: theg pa chen po la bar du gcod pa'i chos
NK121(ko)003:4342: bzhi gsungs te bdag gi yon tan la bstod pa
NK121(ko)003:4343: dang / gzhan gyi yon tan la logs par brjod pa dang /
NK121(ko)003:4344: nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal 'bar ba dang /
NK121(ko)003:4349: 5 de ltar mnyam bzhag tu lta ba stong pa
NK121(ko)003:4350: nyid la yun ring du goms pa dang rjes thob
NK121(ko)003:4351: tu dge ba'i spyod pa dang 'brel bar byas na
NK121(ko)003:4352: / dmigs bcas bsod nams dang dmigs med ye shes
NK121(ko)003:4353: kyi tshogs chen po gnyis kyang rim gyis rdzogs par
NK121(ko)003:4354: / 'gyur zhing / spang bya nyon shes kyi sgrib pa gnyis kyang rim gyis 'byung bar 'gyur te /
NK121(ko)003:4355: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i mdo las /
NK121(ko)003:4356: ye shes kyi tshogs kyis ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur lags so //
NK121(ko)003:4357: bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis ni sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur lags so //
NK121(ko)003:4358: zhes bsod nams kyi tshogs lam gzugs sku gnyis 'byung bas 'gro ba'i nyer 'tsho byed pa'o //
NK121(ko)003:4359: de bzhin du thog med nas goms pa'i gzung 'dzin
NK121(ko)003:4360: gyi rnam par rtog pa dang lhan cig skyes pa'i
NK121(ko)003:4361: bdag 'dzin ma rig pa sgom lam ma gtogs gzhom
NK121(ko)003:4362: dka' ba rnams / dper na sos ka'i dus su
NK121(ko)003:4363: chab rom 'thug po rnams nyi ma rim par shar
NK121(ko)003:4365: spang bya yang de zhi je phrar gyur te rnam
NK121(ko)003:4366: par mi rtog pa'i dbyings su zhi bar 'gyur ro
NK121(ko)003:4367: // lnga pa mthar phyin mi slob pa'i lam la gnyis /
NK121(ko)003:4368: ji lta ji snyed mkhyen pa'i ye shes chos sku dang /
NK121(ko)003:4369: snying rje dang smon lam gyi 'phen pa'i gzhan don gzugs sku ston pa'o //
NK121(ko)003:4372: 5 gzung 'dzin gnyis su rnam par mi rtog cing
NK121(ko)003:4373: dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med lhun gyis grub pa
NK121(ko)003:4374: dag pa gnyis dang ldan pa ni chos kyi sku
NK121(ko)003:4376: de'i tshe sgrib gnyis bag chags dang bcas pa dbyings su dag pas mthong snang 'khrul pa'i yul dang /
NK121(ko)003:4377: khams gsum gyi sems sems byung thams cad rnam par dag pa'i tshul gyis bral nas /
NK121(ko)003:4378: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes nam mkha'i
NK121(ko)003:4379: spyod yul chos nyid 'dus ma byas pa rang rig
NK121(ko)003:4380: rang la lhun grub tu gnas so //
NK121(ko)003:4381: rnam mkhyen 'dus ma byas mi 'thad snyam na //
NK121(ko)003:4383: rnam par shes pa ni skye zhing 'jig pa yul
NK121(ko)003:4384: la thogs pa yod med sogs mthar lhung ba dang
NK121(ko)003:4385: / ye shes ni mi skye mi 'gag sogs de las ldog pa rnams yin par gsungs pa dang /
NK121(ko)003:4387: 'dus ma byas shing lhun gyis grub //
NK121(ko)003:4389: dkon mchog gi za ma tog las kyang gsungs shing
NK121(ko)003:4390: rigs pas kyang grub pas rnam mkhyen 'dus ma byas
NK121(ko)003:4391: so // de las rtog 'dzin med par ji lta
NK121(ko)003:4392: ji snyed kyis bsdus pa'i shes bya thams cad me
NK121(ko)003:4393: long la gzugs brnyan shar ba bzhin du ngang gis
NK121(ko)003:4394: so // mkhyen la / mthu dang rdzu 'phrul gyis
NK121(ko)003:4395: mtshon pa'i yon tan gyi sde tshan nyer gcig sogs
NK121(ko)003:4396: bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnga' 'o //
NK121(ko)003:4399: 5 de ltar kun tu 'od kyi sa la bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas chos sku de thob nas ni /
NK121(ko)003:4400: gdod ma'i gnas lugs kyi dbyings nyid spros pa thams
NK121(ko)003:4401: cad las 'das pas sprul pa spro ba sogs med
NK121(ko)003:4402: kyang sngon spyod pa lam gyi dus nas /
NK121(ko)003:4403: smon lam mang po btab pa'i mthu dang thugs rje
NK121(ko)003:4404: chen pos gzigs pa rgyun mi chad pa yi dbang
NK121(ko)003:4405: gis / 'gro ba'i don du sa dang po nas
NK121(ko)003:4406: bcu pa'i bar la sprul sku la longs sku btags
NK121(ko)003:4407: pa'i longs sku thun mong dang /
NK121(ko)003:4408: sa bcu kho nar snang ba'i longs sku thun mong ma yin pa dang /
NK121(ko)003:4409: gling bzhi bye ba phrag brgya rnams su 'gro 'dul
NK121(ko)003:4410: sprul pa'i sku sna tshogs pa ste gzugs sku gnyis
NK121(ko)003:4411: chos kyi sku las ma g.yos bzhin rang shugs kyis
NK121(ko)003:4412: 'byung ngo // de nas gdul bya sems can so
NK121(ko)003:4413: so'i mos pa dang bsam pa bzhin du sku gsung
NK121(ko)003:4414: thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab
NK121(ko)003:4415: 'byung ngo // pas / rnam par mi rtog bzhin
NK121(ko)003:4416: du theg pa sna tshogs kyi chos ston par byed
NK121(ko)003:4418: ji srid ma stong bar du gzhan don kho na
NK121(ko)003:4421: ji ltar nor bu rin chen rtog med 'dod par nor //
NK121(ko)003:4422: 'bad pa med par gzhan pa dag la rab ster ltar /
NK121(ko)003:4423: de bzhin du thub pa 'bad med ji ltar 'os par ni //
NK121(ko)003:4424: gzhan gyi don du srid pa ji srid rtag tu bzhugs //
NK121(ko)003:4426: de ltar sku dang gsung gi rol pa rnams gdul
NK121(ko)003:4427: bya'i mos pa kho nas bsdus par mi bsam ste
NK121(ko)003:4428: / de ltar na lam la ma zhugs pa yan
NK121(ko)003:4429: chad la rang rgyud kyis mos pas bsdus pa'i sangs
NK121(ko)003:4430: rgyas kyi gzugs sku snang du yod pa sogs thal
NK121(ko)003:4431: / bar 'gyur bas / des na sangs rgyas kyi
NK121(ko)003:4432: thugs rje dang 'gro sems dag pa gnyis rten cing
NK121(ko)003:4434: 'gro sems la sku gsung gi rnam par shar ba
NK121(ko)003:4435: ni bum pa'i rnam ldan gyi shes pa bzhin no
NK121(ko)003:4436: // gzugs sku zag med kyi dge ba'i gzugs brnyan
NK121(ko)003:4437: yin yang ngo bo chos sku las ma 'das pas
NK121(ko)003:4438: // / ye shes dang yon tan mtha' dag mnga'
NK121(ko)003:4439: zhing chos sku la'ang gzugs sku'i yon tan thams cad
NK121(ko)003:4440: rang rgyud can ma yin par /
NK121(ko)003:4441: chu la rlan dang me la tsha ba bzhin ldan
NK121(ko)003:4442: pa ni sems can gyi khams la ji skad bshad
NK121(ko)003:4443: pa bzhin te / 'on kyang ngo bo spros pa dang bral zhing dag pa gnyis dang ldan pa'o //
NK121(ko)003:4444: phyogs mthun gyi dpe nor bu la sogs pa ste
NK121(ko)003:4445: gzhan du na smon lam dang thugs rjes 'phen rgyus
NK121(ko)003:4446: dben pa'i bem stong bzhin no //
NK121(ko)003:4447: sngar rtsa ba'i sa bcad gsum pa mjug gdams pa'i don la gnyis /
NK121(ko)003:4449: chos nyan bshad byed pa gzhan la gdams pa'o //
NK121(ko)003:4450: dang po la bcu gcig ste /
NK121(ko)003:4451: byang chub rang gzhan kun gyi thun mong yin pas sgrub par gdams pa /
NK121(ko)003:4452: ston pa'i bstan pa dpes kun gyis rtogs rung ba dang /
NK121(ko)003:4453: mi rtag pa'i skyo bas chos la bskul ba dang /
NK121(ko)003:4454: dal 'byor rnyed dka' bsam nas chos la bskul ba dang /
NK121(ko)003:4455: 'bras bu sdug bsngal shes kyang rgyu sdig pa byed pa la snying rje ba dang /
NK121(ko)003:4456: slob dpon nyid kyang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis skyo nas gzhan la gdams pa dang /
NK121(ko)003:4457: byis pa rnams bdag 'dzin gyi khar mi bzung bar thar ba la brod pa skyed pa dang /
NK121(ko)003:4458: gang zag chos mdzad bye brag la gdams pa dang /
NK121(ko)003:4459: dge sdig phan gnod che ba dpes bstan pa dang /
NK121(ko)003:4460: thar pa rang la rag lus pa dang /
NK121(ko)003:4461: yun gyis don med par rgas pa la snying rje ba'o //
NK121(ko)003:4464: 5 de phyir ram de nas slob dpon bdag kyang ri khrod dgon par mchi ba lags na /
NK121(ko)003:4465: bden pa bzhi'i sgo nas thar pa byang chub chen
NK121(ko)003:4466: po bsgrub pa'i tshul yan lag pa'i don de dag
NK121(ko)003:4467: kyang ni gong du bshad pa de bzhin du thar
NK121(ko)003:4468: 'dod rnams kyis dgongs par mdzod la /
NK121(ko)003:4469: dam pa'i chos tshul bzhin bsgrub par bya ba la brtson 'grus kyis 'bad par rigs te /
NK121(ko)003:4470: khams gsum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal de dang ni 'bras
NK121(ko)003:4471: bu byang chub kyi go 'phang ni kha cig tsam
NK121(ko)003:4472: ma yin par 'o skol skye bo kun gyi thun
NK121(ko)003:4476: 11 bdag cag gi ston pa'i bstan pa rin po
NK121(ko)003:4477: che ni gdugs te nyi ma bzhin du ris med
NK121(ko)003:4478: pa'i 'gro ba kun la snyoms par bzhugs kyang /
NK121(ko)003:4479: kha byang du bltas pa'i phugs par nyi ma mi
NK121(ko)003:4480: 'char ba dang 'dra ba'i skye bo log sred can
NK121(ko)003:4481: gyis mi rtogs pas ston pa dang de'i bstan pa
NK121(ko)003:4482: la yid ches kyi dad pa'i sgo nas dam pa'i
NK121(ko)003:4483: chos sgrub pa la 'bad dgos zhes gdams so //
NK121(ko)003:4484: slad nas chos mdzad rnams la zhu bar bya ba ni 'di ltar te /
NK121(ko)003:4485: do cig gam da lo zhes mchis pas sang phod
NK121(ko)003:4486: ces pa'ang nges par mchis pa 'jig rten na yongs
NK121(ko)003:4488: tshe 'di mchis pas tshe slad ma'ang nges par mchis pa yin la /
NK121(ko)003:4489: glo bur gyi tshe la nges pa med pas sang
NK121(ko)003:4490: phod kyi lo dang sku tshe slad ma gnyis gang
NK121(ko)003:4491: sngar 'ong ba su la'ang gtol med pa yin na
NK121(ko)003:4492: / sang phod don du da lo nas so nam
NK121(ko)003:4493: la 'bad pa bzhin du tshe slad ma'i don du
NK121(ko)003:4494: da lta nas chos la ci'i phyir 'bad par mi
NK121(ko)003:4496: ci'i phyir zhe na mi rtag pa srin po lta
NK121(ko)003:4497: bu'i so bar du bzung bzhin pa de ma tshor
NK121(ko)003:4499: myur du 'chi ba las mi thar nges pas 'phral
NK121(ko)003:4500: dang yun gyi bde ba'i rgyu bsod nams myur du
NK121(ko)003:4502: lam rnams thams cad 'chi bdag nyid kyis bkag /
NK121(ko)003:4503: dog pa med par rab tu dga' bzhin spyod //
NK121(ko)003:4504: 'gro ba 'di lta bur ni 'khod pa la //
NK121(ko)003:4505: skye bo 'jigs pa med pa ngo mtshar che //
NK121(ko)003:4509: 7 dam pa'i chos sgrub pa la brtson 'grus dgos
NK121(ko)003:4510: de'i mi mthun phyogs le lo dang de'i gnyen po
NK121(ko)003:4511: mi rtag par bsam pa las lhag med pas /
NK121(ko)003:4512: nges par 'chi ba dang nam 'chi cha med la
NK121(ko)003:4513: bsam ste chos med du skad cig kyang mi 'dug
NK121(ko)003:4514: par dge ba'i las kyi bsags pa rnams nyin re
NK121(ko)003:4515: zhing bgrang la / 'grub pa la yi rangs ste
NK121(ko)003:4516: bsngo bar bya slan chad kyang mu mthud nas bsgrub
NK121(ko)003:4517: zhing bgrang la / par bya / sngon bram ze
NK121(ko)003:4518: sgra mkhan bya bas dge sdig gnyis rde'u dkar nag
NK121(ko)003:4519: gis bgrangs nas brtson pa'i dpe ltar ro //
NK121(ko)003:4520: de ltar tshod yod dang long yod mi bya bar
NK121(ko)003:4521: ma 'bad na tshe 'di ni rtag mi thub pa
NK121(ko)003:4522: rtsa rtse'i zil ba dang 'dra ste med la khad
NK121(ko)003:4523: dang / kha'i dbugs kyi rgyu ba 'di ni na
NK121(ko)003:4524: bun dang 'dra ste yun med pa yal la khad
NK121(ko)003:4526: gsog cing ya ma barla sgyu ma'i skyes bu dang
NK121(ko)003:4527: 'dra ste dngos po'i snang ba med pa yud tsam
NK121(ko)003:4529: sems dngos med 'di ni glog dang 'dra ste med snang skad cig ma'i rang bzhin no //
NK121(ko)003:4530: bu smad sogs nye bzhi gzhon lus mdzes shing gos rgyan longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa rnams ni /
