NK121(ko)003:4531: snying la sdug cing 'bral du phongs pa yin kyang
NK121(ko)003:4532: mi rtag pa'i chos can byis pa 'drid pa'i 'ja'
NK121(ko)003:4533: tshon dang 'dra'o // khyim bdag dpal byin gyis zhus pa las /
NK121(ko)003:4534: lo stong bye bar su zhig 'tsho 'gyur ba //
NK121(ko)003:4535: des kyang chags pa yongs su spang bya na //
NK121(ko)003:4536: su zhig lo brgya thub par mi 'gyur ba //
NK121(ko)003:4537: de phyir dga' ba mi rnyed smos ci dgos //
NK121(ko)003:4541: 8 g.yar po'i cha spyad ni bdag pos nam 'khyer
NK121(ko)003:4542: ma nges pa ltar phung po 'di yang g.yar po
NK121(ko)003:4544: dam pa'i chos sgrub pa la myur du ma 'bad
NK121(ko)003:4545: na dal 'byor gyi mi lus lan cig thob pa
NK121(ko)003:4546: nyid kyang chud za bar 'gyur zhing /
NK121(ko)003:4547: sngon gyi dge 'bras de stong zad du song na
NK121(ko)003:4548: slad nas ni rgyu med par 'bras bu mi lus
NK121(ko)003:4550: bla med byang chub chen po'i 'bras bu ni lta ga la thob ste mi thob bo //
NK121(ko)003:4551: mi lus thob par ma gyur na //
NK121(ko)003:4552: sdig pa 'ba' zhig dge ba med //
NK121(ko)003:4554: sdig pa'i dbang gis ngan song du skyes nas sdug bsngal byung ba'i tshe /
NK121(ko)003:4555: tshe 'dir btsan phyug snyan sgrags sogs kyi bde ba
NK121(ko)003:4556: de ni dran pa'i yul tsam du'ang med pas ci
NK121(ko)003:4557: zhig phan te mi phan pa ni /
NK121(ko)003:4558: dper na sngar zas zos pas lto 'grang ba des
NK121(ko)003:4559: da ltar bkres pa la mi phan pa bzhin no
NK121(ko)003:4560: // slob ma la spring yig tu /
NK121(ko)003:4561: gang zhig thob na skye ba'i rgya mtsho mthar byas shing //
NK121(ko)003:4562: byang chub mchog gi sa bon dge ba'ang 'deb 'gyur ba //
NK121(ko)003:4563: yid bzhin nor bu bas kyang yon tan ches lhag pa'i //
NK121(ko)003:4564: mi nyid de ni su zhig 'bras bu med par byed //
NK121(ko)003:4566: khyad par du theg pa chen po'i lam gyis mi lus don ldan du bya dgos pa ni /
NK121(ko)003:4568: dam chos sgron ma dang bcas shing //
NK121(ko)003:4569: mi khom brgyad spangs dal ba 'di //
NK121(ko)003:4570: skyes bu chen po'i spyod pa yis //
NK121(ko)003:4571: 'bras bu yod par bya ba'i rigs //
NK121(ko)003:4575: 2 'di na dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mthong zhing thos pas shes kyang mi 'jigs par ma zad /
NK121(ko)003:4576: mi rtag cing snying po med pa'i lus la chags
NK121(ko)003:4577: nas de'i don du srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i
NK121(ko)003:4578: sdig pa kho na la spyod pa dag ni /
NK121(ko)003:4579: gzhan su yang ma yin par byis pas blun po
NK121(ko)003:4580: rang gis rang brlag pa kho nar zad de kye
NK121(ko)003:4581: ma'o // zhes rus pa'i gting nas snying re rje'o //
NK121(ko)003:4583: byis pa sdug bsngal gyis dub cing //
NK121(ko)003:4584: sdug bsngal rgyu ma 'jug par byed //
NK121(ko)003:4588: sdug bsngal nyid la mngon par rgyug /
NK121(ko)003:4592: 9 khams gsum 'khor ba gcong rong nyam nga ba
NK121(ko)003:4593: lta bu sdug bsngal gyi gnas 'di ni rmongs pa
NK121(ko)003:4594: bdag gis brtags kyang yid 'byung ba'i gnas 'di ltar
NK121(ko)003:4595: gda' ste / sdug bsngal gsum dang brgyad kyis rtag tu gzir bas nyam re thag pa ni /
NK121(ko)003:4596: ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal ni skyi re g.ya' ste thos pa tsam yang mi bzod pa dang /
NK121(ko)003:4597: khyad par du yang tsha grang dmyal khams bco brgyad
NK121(ko)003:4598: kyi sdug bsngal ni shin tu ya re cha zhes
NK121(ko)003:4600: mi la skye rga na 'chi bzhi dang dgra sdang
NK121(ko)003:4601: ba dang 'phrad gnyen byams pa dang bral 'dod pa'i
NK121(ko)003:4602: thog tu mi khel mi 'dod pa thog tu 'bab
NK121(ko)003:4603: pa dang brgyad / sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang
NK121(ko)003:4604: 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang khyab pa 'du byed kyi
NK121(ko)003:4605: sdug bsngal dang bcu gcig go //
NK121(ko)003:4606: ngan song gi sdug bsngal der 'adu'o //
NK121(ko)003:4607: sdug bsngal de rnams kyang thog mtha' med par 'khor
NK121(ko)003:4608: ba yun re ring bas zhib tu bsam na snying
NK121(ko)003:4611: mel tshe byed la mtshan yang ring //
NK121(ko)003:4612: ngal ba dag la dpag tshad ring //
NK121(ko)003:4613: dam chos rnam par mi shes pa'i //
NK121(ko)003:4614: byis pa rnams la 'khor ba ring //
NK121(ko)003:4616: de'i phyir slob dpon bdag kyang bdag rang la snying rje ba yin na /
NK121(ko)003:4617: khyed chos mdzad rnams kyis 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal de la ma gzigs sam /
NK121(ko)003:4618: gzigs na ci'i phyir khyed cag sems bde bar 'dug
NK121(ko)003:4619: ste skad cig kyang bag med du 'dug mi rigs
NK121(ko)003:4620: so // slob dpon sa 'tsho sbyin gyis /
NK121(ko)003:4621: skye dang 'chi dang sdug bsngal mthar ni ma byas par //
NK121(ko)003:4622: srid pa'i rgya mtsho dag tu bying 'gyur bag med ma byed cig /
NK121(ko)003:4623: mthar byed dag gis srog kyang 'phrog par byed pa gang 'di ni //
NK121(ko)003:4624: rgyun mi 'chad par 'gro la s+t+wa re'i so dag brdar bar byed //
NK121(ko)003:4628: 6 rgyu mtshan de bas na byis pa'i skye bo
NK121(ko)003:4629: dag rnam par rtog pa bdag 'dzin gyi kha ma
NK121(ko)003:4630: 'dzin zhes de'i dbang du ma gtong ngam bdag 'dzin
NK121(ko)003:4632: bu dang chung ma gnyen bshes la sogs pa dang
NK121(ko)003:4633: lus dang longs spyod kun la da lta nas yid
NK121(ko)003:4634: ma chags te / 'di dag dang yun du 'grogs
NK121(ko)003:4635: pa'i dbang med mi rtag pa myur du 'bral ba'i
NK121(ko)003:4636: sdug bsngal gyi rgyu yin par bsam zhing /
NK121(ko)003:4637: gtso cher tshe phyi ma'i sdug bsngal la 'jigs pa
NK121(ko)003:4638: skyed cing bde ba'i phul zhi ba mya ngan las
NK121(ko)003:4639: 'das pa'i bde ba la 'dod pa bskyed la /
NK121(ko)003:4640: sdig pa mi dge ba spang zhing dge ba'i spyod pa la tshul bzhin du zhugs par mdzod cig /
NK121(ko)003:4642: gang zhig dge la nyer bstan pa'i //
NK121(ko)003:4643: mi ni shin tu bkra shis 'gyur //
NK121(ko)003:4644: gang zhig sdig la nyer bsten pa //
NK121(ko)003:4645: de ni shin tu bkra mi shis //
NK121(ko)003:4646: thog ma bar dang mthar ngan pa //
NK121(ko)003:4647: dam pas de ni rnam par smad //
NK121(ko)003:4651: 3 tshe blos btang ba 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal la
NK121(ko)003:4652: 'jigs pa 'gro la bu ltar sems pa sogs kyi
NK121(ko)003:4653: chos tshul bzhin sgrub pa med na /
NK121(ko)003:4654: chos pa'i ming de don ci zhig yod pa la
NK121(ko)003:4655: btags te chos pa'i gzugs brnyan tsam las don 'bras
NK121(ko)003:4656: med do // de bzhin du chos 'dul ba las
NK121(ko)003:4657: bshad pa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa rnam par dag
NK121(ko)003:4658: pa med na dge slong zhes don ci zhig la
NK121(ko)003:4659: med do // zer / dge slong la ming gi
NK121(ko)003:4660: dge slong khas 'che ba'i dge slong slong ba'i ngang
NK121(ko)003:4661: tshul can gyi dge slong zhes bya ba la sogs
NK121(ko)003:4662: pa tsam las dge slong du byed pa'i don med
NK121(ko)003:4663: med do // zer / la / sgo gsum sku
NK121(ko)003:4664: gsung thugs kyi rdo rje gsum las mi 'da' ba'i
NK121(ko)003:4665: steng rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig tshul
NK121(ko)003:4666: bzhin bsrung ba med na sngags pa zhes ci 'dra
NK121(ko)003:4667: ba la zer gdags gzhi med do //
NK121(ko)003:4668: btsun pa tshul khrims med pa'i spyang po dang sngags
NK121(ko)003:4669: pa dam tshig med pa'i glen pa de 'dras bstan
NK121(ko)003:4673: 4 sdig pa ni ji ltar chung yang 'dis ci
NK121(ko)003:4674: gnod snyam du brnyas par mi bya zhing spang zhing
NK121(ko)003:4675: bshags dgos kyi / dug gsum gyis bskyed pa'i las
NK121(ko)003:4676: yin na sdig pa yin dgos de yin na rnam
NK121(ko)003:4677: bshags dgos kyi / smin myong dgos / dper na
NK121(ko)003:4678: shig bsad pa tsam yang kun slong nyon mongs snga
NK121(ko)003:4679: ma gnyis med kyang gti mug gi las yin no
NK121(ko)003:4680: bshags dgos kyi / smin myong dgos / // sbrul
NK121(ko)003:4681: chung ngus zin kyang dug langs na sbrul chen pos
NK121(ko)003:4683: de bzhin du chu thigs chung ngus kyang rim par bsags na snod chen po gang ba bzhin du /
NK121(ko)003:4684: dge ba chung yang 'dis ci phan zhes khyad du
NK121(ko)003:4685: mi gsod par dang du blang zhing spyad na rdul
NK121(ko)003:4686: phran du ma bsags pas snod kyi 'jig rten grub
NK121(ko)003:4687: pa bzhin du dge ba chen po 'grub pa'o //
NK121(ko)003:4689: dge ba chung yang brnyas mi bya //
NK121(ko)003:4690: de ni bdag la mi phan min //
NK121(ko)003:4691: chu yi thigs pa bsags pa yis //
NK121(ko)003:4692: snod chen gang bar 'gyur ba bzhin //
NK121(ko)003:4693: dam pa mchog gi bsod nams ni //
NK121(ko)003:4694: nyung ngu nyung ngu bsags nas rdzogs //
NK121(ko)003:4698: 4 thar 'dod rnams kyis thar pa sgrub pa ni bdag rang la rag las kyi 'di la ni /
NK121(ko)003:4699: gzhan gyis grogs bgyi bar byas nas 'grub pa ni ci yang ma mchis te /
NK121(ko)003:4700: gal te gzhan gyis grogs bgyis nas 'grub pa zhig mchis na /
NK121(ko)003:4701: thugs rje chen po mnga' ba'i 'phags pa sangs rgyas
NK121(ko)003:4702: rnams kyis 'gro ba kun dus gcig la sgrol bar
NK121(ko)003:4703: rigs kyang de ni ma yin no //
NK121(ko)003:4705: thub rnams sdig pa chu yis mi 'khru zhing //
NK121(ko)003:4706: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal phyag gis yongs mi sel //
NK121(ko)003:4707: nyid kyi rtogs pa gzhan la 'pho min te //
NK121(ko)003:4708: snying rjes bden pa'i bstan pa 'gro la bshad //
NK121(ko)003:4710: ngas ni khyod la thar pa'i thabs bstan gyi //
NK121(ko)003:4711: thar pa rang la rag las shes par gyis //
NK121(ko)003:4715: 9 thar pa rang gis sgrub dgos pa de'i phyir
NK121(ko)003:4716: byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi rtsa ba 'gro ba
NK121(ko)003:4717: mtha' yas pa la dmigs nas snying rje dang phan
NK121(ko)003:4718: sems bskyed / lam gyi dngos gzhi kun nyon 'khor
NK121(ko)003:4719: ba'i chos dang rnam byang myang 'das kyi chos la
NK121(ko)003:4720: gzung bya bden par zhen pa dang /
NK121(ko)003:4721: bdag gang zag rdzas su grub pa dang bden par
NK121(ko)003:4722: grub pa yod par 'dzin gyi gzung 'dzin gyi rnam
NK121(ko)003:4723: par rtog pa bzhi la sogs pa'i kun rtog thams
NK121(ko)003:4724: cad thar ba'i dgra gcig pu de yi gnyen po
NK121(ko)003:4725: zab mo stong pa nyid sngar bshad pa ltar bsgom
NK121(ko)003:4726: par bya / thabs dang shes rab de gnyis kas
NK121(ko)003:4727: zin pa'i dge rtsa che chung ci mdzad thams cad
NK121(ko)003:4728: nyan rang gi sar ma yin par byang chub chen
NK121(ko)003:4729: po thob pa'i phyir du bsngo ba ste /
NK121(ko)003:4730: de ltar dam pa gsum gyis zin pa'i dge rtsa
NK121(ko)003:4731: spyad na 'phral dang yun du bde ba'i rgyur 'gyur
NK121(ko)003:4732: la / yun du bde ba'i rgyu chos zab mo'i
NK121(ko)003:4733: don de ltar ma rtogs na rgas nas skra dkar
NK121(ko)003:4734: po skyes shing gdong la gnyer ma'i tshogs 'dus kyang
NK121(ko)003:4735: la / / chos sgrub mi nus pa'i byis pa
NK121(ko)003:4736: shed ma phyed par khye'u dang 'dra ste de gnyis
NK121(ko)003:4737: ka chos ma bsgrub pa ni 'dra zhing na tshod
NK121(ko)003:4739: gzhon pa'i dus su nus kyang ma bsgrub rgas pa'i
NK121(ko)003:4740: dus su mos kyang mi 'grub pa'i gnas skabs de
NK121(ko)003:4742: don de la mkhas pas bltas na khrel zhing snying re yang rje'o //
NK121(ko)003:4743: de bas na dam pa'i chos bka' sde snod kyi gzhung las byung ba bzhin du spyad par bya'o //
NK121(ko)003:4744: bu mo bdun gyi rtogs brjod las /
NK121(ko)003:4745: rmi lam mig 'phrul chu zla lta bu rang bzhin gyis //
NK121(ko)003:4746: g.yo bar rtogs la ji srid srog 'di lhag ma dang //
NK121(ko)003:4747: bcas shing lus gzhon gyur tshe chags dang nyer bral byos //
NK121(ko)003:4748: gshin rje chu srin rga ba'i khar ni tshud gyur cing //
NK121(ko)003:4749: skra dkar tshogs kyi gnyer mas spyi nas bzung nas ni //
NK121(ko)003:4750: srog mthar gyur pa'i gnod pa'i tsher mas gnad phig pa //
NK121(ko)003:4751: mchi mas mig khengs gyur tshe dge ba ji ltar bya //
NK121(ko)003:4753: 'dir mi rtag pa dran pa yang yang gsungs pa ni //
NK121(ko)003:4754: chos mi bsgrub pa ni le lo'i dbang gis yin
NK121(ko)003:4755: la sgrub pa ni brtson 'grus la rag las pas
NK121(ko)003:4756: / mi rtag pa dran pa le lo'i gnyen po
NK121(ko)003:4757: dang brtson 'grus kyi rgyu byed pa yin pa'i phyir
NK121(ko)003:4759: bram ze la sbyin pa chen po ji ltar btang ba bas /
NK121(ko)003:4760: phyi rol pa'i 'dod pa'i chags bral brgya la sbyin pa'i bsod nams ches mang bar bshad de /
NK121(ko)003:4762: zhing gi skyon ni r+ts+wa yin ltar //
NK121(ko)003:4763: skye rgu rnams la 'dod chags skyon //
NK121(ko)003:4764: de bzhin chags pa bral rnams la //
NK121(ko)003:4765: phul na bsod nams chen po 'byung //
NK121(ko)003:4767: de bas ni rgyun zhugs pa dang de bas 'bras
NK121(ko)003:4768: gnas sogs nas bsgres te dgra bcom pa la phul
NK121(ko)003:4769: na bsod nams ches mang ba dang /
NK121(ko)003:4770: de bas gtsug lag khang sogs byed pa dang /
NK121(ko)003:4771: de bas skyabs su 'gro ba sogs dang de bas
NK121(ko)003:4772: mi rtag pa sgom pa ches bsod nams mang bar
NK121(ko)003:4773: gsungs na / de bas stong pa nyid dang snying
NK121(ko)003:4774: rje dang byang chub kyi sems sgom pa lta ci
NK121(ko)003:4776: sbyin pa dman pa la gsungs shing //
NK121(ko)003:4777: 'bring la tshul khrims gsungs pa ste //
NK121(ko)003:4778: mchog la zhi ba gsungs gyur pa //
NK121(ko)003:4779: des na rtag tu mchog goms bya //
NK121(ko)003:4782: chu snying myur pos sdong po khyer ba'i dpes lam
NK121(ko)003:4783: la gegs med par bslab na rim par rnam mkhyen
NK121(ko)003:4785: bstan pa dam pa'i chos kyi chu bo la zhugs te /
NK121(ko)003:4786: mi rtag pa dang brtson 'grus kyi rlung dang byams
NK121(ko)003:4787: snying rje byang chub kyi rlan dang bcas pa bstan
NK121(ko)003:4788: pa'i chu snying 'dul khrims la brten nas /
NK121(ko)003:4789: sdong po de skam la mi gnas pa ltar mngon mtho la mi smon /
NK121(ko)003:4790: chu gting du mi lhung ba ltar ngan song du mi 'gro /
NK121(ko)003:4791: mis ma bzung ba ltar mi dang mi 'dre /
NK121(ko)003:4792: mi ma yin pas ma bzung ba ltar lha dang mi 'dre /
NK121(ko)003:4793: tshu rol du mi ltung ba ltar nang dbang po bsdams shing phung po la mi chags /
NK121(ko)003:4794: pha rol du mi lhung ba ltar phyi tshogs drug la mi chags /
NK121(ko)003:4795: sdong po nang mi 'drul ba ltar tshul khrims mi nyams pa ste /
NK121(ko)003:4796: thar pa bsgrub par bya ba ni de lta bu dgos par gsungs so //
NK121(ko)003:4797: gnyis pa chos nyan bshad byed pa la gdams pa dgu /
NK121(ko)003:4798: thos pa dgos kyang tshig rjes mi 'brang ba dang /
NK121(ko)003:4799: sgrub pa gtso bor bstan pa dang /
NK121(ko)003:4800: stong nyid bsgom na 'bras bu thob pa dang /
NK121(ko)003:4801: thos pa gnyen por ma song nyon mongs pa'i grogs su song ba dang /
NK121(ko)003:4802: don la dpyad na snying po mthong ba'i dpe dang /
NK121(ko)003:4803: rang blos gang lcogs sgrub pa dang /
NK121(ko)003:4804: thabs shes mi ldan theg chen rlom pa'i dpe /
NK121(ko)003:4805: theg chen ma mos kyang skur 'debs spangs nas gang mos ltar byed pa dang /
NK121(ko)003:4806: gsang sngags khe nyen che bar bstan pa'o //
NK121(ko)003:4809: 5 slad ma'i dus chos nyan bshad mdzad pa rnams la zhu ba ni 'di ltar /
NK121(ko)003:4810: dam pa'i chos kyi gzhung las ni bdag cag gi
NK121(ko)003:4811: skyon yon thams cad bshad pas chos kyis bdag bshad
NK121(ko)003:4812: na / bdag cag gis chos ma bshad pas skyon
NK121(ko)003:4813: yon blang dor sogs ci yang mi mthong ba'i phyir
NK121(ko)003:4814: na / / da ni bsgrub bya'i don rtogs par
NK121(ko)003:4815: bya ba'i phyir dang po lung gi chos mnyan yang
NK121(ko)003:4816: dgos pas skyes bu dam pa'i zhal nas gsung rab
NK121(ko)003:4817: zab mo tshul bzhin du thos par bya'o //
NK121(ko)003:4819: thos med dmus long bsgom pa'i tshul mi shes //
NK121(ko)003:4820: de med des ko ci zhig bsam par bya //
NK121(ko)003:4821: de bas thos la brtson bya de'i rgyu las //
NK121(ko)003:4822: bsam zhing bsgoms pas shes rab yangs pa 'byung //
NK121(ko)003:4824: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas thos pa mang
NK121(ko)003:4825: po la mngon par mi brtson pa ni bdud sdig
NK121(ko)003:4826: can gyi byin gyis brlabs pa nyid yin no zhes
NK121(ko)003:4827: byang sems so thar las gsungs /
NK121(ko)003:4829: byang sems gang dag sbyor ba med cing bsam gtan med la spong ba med cing /
NK121(ko)003:4830: 'don pa med pa dang mang du thos pa med
NK121(ko)003:4831: pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa
NK121(ko)003:4832: la rab tu byung ba ma yin no //
NK121(ko)003:4834: chos 'chad pa'i snod kyang bzhi brgya par /
NK121(ko)003:4835: gzur gnas blo ldan don gnyer ba //
NK121(ko)003:4836: nyan po snod ces bya bar brjod //
NK121(ko)003:4838: skye bo gang gang la dga' ba //
NK121(ko)003:4839: de ni de yis sngar bshad bya //
NK121(ko)003:4840: nyams par gyur pa dam chos kyi //
NK121(ko)003:4841: snod ni cis kyang ma yin no //
NK121(ko)003:4843: chos 'chad pa pos kyang tshul bzhin du bshad dgos tshul mang yang /
NK121(ko)003:4845: dag cing zang zing med pa'i sems kyis su //
NK121(ko)003:4846: chos kyi sbyin byed rgyal bas rab tu basngagasa //
NK121(ko)003:4848: phan yon mtha' yas kyang dbang lung la thos bsam
NK121(ko)003:4849: byas pas mig ldan gyi gzugs mthong ba ltar spang
NK121(ko)003:4850: blang la mi rmongs shing tshul khrims dang ting nge
NK121(ko)003:4851: 'dzin dang shes rab gsum gyis rnam par grol ba
NK121(ko)003:4853: thos pas chos rnams shes par 'gyur //
NK121(ko)003:4854: thos pas sdig las ldog par 'gyur //
NK121(ko)003:4855: thos pas don ma yin pa spong //
NK121(ko)003:4856: thos pas rnam par grol ba thob //
NK121(ko)003:4858: des na dang po chos 'chad nyan nyams su myong
NK121(ko)003:4859: ba ci rigs pas don la nges pa rnyed nas
NK121(ko)003:4860: / tshig mang po la bslab mi dgos te tshig
NK121(ko)003:4861: gi tshogs ni mi zad pa'i phyir nyan pa kho
NK121(ko)003:4862: nas shes bya mthar phyin pa med pas thos pa
NK121(ko)003:4863: la 'bad pa tsam gyis tshe 'da' bar 'gyur ro
NK121(ko)003:4866: 6 chos kyi brda dang tha snyad mang po shes
NK121(ko)003:4867: pa des kyang mi chog par don nyams su blangs
NK121(ko)003:4869: dper na gzhan las thos pas lam gyi rgyus shes
NK121(ko)003:4870: kyang der ched du mi 'gro na de shes pas
NK121(ko)003:4871: ci phan te don thog tu mi sleb pa'i de
NK121(ko)003:4872: bzhin no // mnyan bshad dgos pa ni don sgrub pa'i thabs btsal ba'i phyir yin la /
NK121(ko)003:4873: don mi bsgrub na nyan bshad tsam ni sgrub pa
NK121(ko)003:4874: la ltos na don chung ngu la tshig re chad
NK121(ko)003:4876: dper na bro mkhan dang sgrung mkhan dag gis bro
NK121(ko)003:4877: sgrung 'chad pa bzhin du thos pa kho na lhur
NK121(ko)003:4878: len pa de ni mi nag chos kyi lo rgyus
NK121(ko)003:4880: spyir thos pa'i phan yon bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang lung gi bstan pa'i gsos su che yang /
NK121(ko)003:4881: de tsam las don nyams su len pa med na
NK121(ko)003:4882: sgrub pa'i bstan pa nyams par 'gyur ba la dgongs
NK121(ko)003:4883: pa ste / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bstan pa'i
NK121(ko)003:4884: phyogs gang nyams na de nyid mchog tu basngagasa te
NK121(ko)003:4885: cig shos smad par mdzad do //
NK121(ko)003:4886: dper na sbyin pa gtsigs su bzung nas tshul khrims
NK121(ko)003:4887: gal chung byed pa la tshul khrims mchog tu basngagasa
NK121(ko)003:4888: te cig shos smad par mdzad pa lta bu'o //
NK121(ko)003:4889: kun rdzob tshig gi don mang po la ngal ba kho nas nyon mongs pa spong mi nus te /
NK121(ko)003:4890: zla ba'i snying po'i mdo las /
NK121(ko)003:4891: dper na me stag gang gis kyang kyang //
NK121(ko)003:4892: rgya mtsho chen po skem mi nus //
NK121(ko)003:4893: de bzhin kun rdzob bden pas kyang //
NK121(ko)003:4894: rang gi nyon mongs skem mi nus //
NK121(ko)003:4895: sems can gzhan lta smos ci dgos //
NK121(ko)003:4899: 5 sgrub thabs thams cad kyi snying po mchog ni stong pa nyid sgom pa yin la /
NK121(ko)003:4900: stong pa nyid bsgoms pas go 'phang mchog thob par mthong na /
NK121(ko)003:4901: thos pa mang po'i tshig la mkhas pa ni ne
NK121(ko)003:4902: tso mi skad shes pas gzhan gyi ngag rjes zlos
NK121(ko)003:4904: thos pa nyung ngu la bsten nas bsgrubs pas na
NK121(ko)003:4905: 'phags pa lam phran brtan lta bu yin pas 'bras
NK121(ko)003:4906: bu bde blag tu thob bo //
NK121(ko)003:4907: 'di'i sngon byung ni gnas brten lam chung ba des
NK121(ko)003:4908: dang po bram ze'i chos klog pa la sid rjod
NK121(ko)003:4909: tshe d+ham brjod / b+h+au rjod tshe'ang de bzhin du gyur pas de dag gis bskrad do //
NK121(ko)003:4910: phyis lam chen pas rab tu byung la /
NK121(ko)003:4911: lus ngag yid kyis sdig pa mi bya zhing //
NK121(ko)003:4912: 'jig rten kun la yongs 'dzin 'dod bral ba //
NK121(ko)003:4913: dran dang ldan zhing shes bzhin can gyis ni //
NK121(ko)003:4914: gnod ldan sdug bsgral gang yin bsten mi bya //
NK121(ko)003:4915: zhes gsungs pa de zla ba gsum du ma lob
NK121(ko)003:4916: par rdzi'u la sogs pas kyang shes nas de dag
NK121(ko)003:4918: phyis ston pas de la dge 'dun gyi mchil lhwam
NK121(ko)003:4919: phyi ba dang phyag dar byed bcug pa mdzad pas
NK121(ko)003:4920: sgrib pa sbyangs nas dgra bcom thob /
NK121(ko)003:4921: de'i tshe dge slong ma rnams kyi ston par bsko
NK121(ko)003:4922: ba ris su babs pa na 'phags pa lam chung
NK121(ko)003:4923: ba byon te / sngar gyi tshigs bcad de zhag
NK121(ko)003:4924: bdun gyi bar du tshig dang yi ge gzhan gyis
NK121(ko)003:4926: tshigs bcad phyed kyi don khrol ba dang 'khor khri nyis stong gis bden pa mthong zhing /
NK121(ko)003:4927: 'bras bu bzhi la bkod de so so'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
NK121(ko)003:4928: ston pas de gdams ngag phran bus 'bras bu chen
NK121(ko)003:4929: po la bzhag pa'ang sngon ston pa nyid tshong dpon
NK121(ko)003:4931: lam pa de tshong ba'i bu dbul por gyur pa
NK121(ko)003:4932: la byi ba'i ro'i thabs bstan pas des phyi rol
NK121(ko)003:4933: der tshong pa zhig gi byi la btags pa la
NK121(ko)003:4934: byin pa des sran ma spar gang khug /
NK121(ko)003:4935: de shing thu ba rnams ngal bso bcug nas byin
NK121(ko)003:4936: de dag gis de la shing shar re byin pas
NK121(ko)003:4937: khur du longs pa btsong ba'i mthar dbyig tshong ba
NK121(ko)003:4938: 'i song tshe ded dpon byi dbyig pa'o //
NK121(ko)003:4939: sngon rgyal ba 'od srung gi dus dge slong sde
NK121(ko)003:4940: snod gsum par gyur pa na chos la ser sna
NK121(ko)003:4941: byas te tshig gcig kyang ma bstan pas rtul por
NK121(ko)003:4942: gyur / yang phag tshong bar gyur tshe phag mang
NK121(ko)003:4943: po bsreg nas grur bcug de skal bas gru rdib
NK121(ko)003:4944: gyur / nas chus khyer / chu'i phar 'gram na
NK121(ko)003:4945: rang sangs rgyas shig bzhugs pas blangs nas bye ma
NK121(ko)003:4947: yar sos tshe bltas pa'i mi rjes rig nas song pas rang sangs rgyas de mjal /
NK121(ko)003:4948: de la lo ma dang so shing 'bras bu sogs phul /
NK121(ko)003:4949: des lhung bzed kyi lhag ma byin /
NK121(ko)003:4950: de bsam gtan byed pa la bltas te kho rang yang mtha' gcig tu song nas /
NK121(ko)003:4951: mnyam bzhag byas pas chos nyid kyis 'du shes med
NK121(ko)003:4952: pa'i snyoms 'jug grub nas der bskal pa grangs med
NK121(ko)003:4954: chos la ser sna byas pa dang phag btsong ba'i sgrib pas shes pa bul ba'o //
NK121(ko)003:4955: de sngon thos pa'i rgyu'i stobs can dang 'phral rkyen sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin yang /
NK121(ko)003:4956: de 'dra min par dbang po rnon po yongs 'dzin
NK121(ko)003:4957: dam pa'i gdams ngag gis sgrub pa la brtson na
NK121(ko)003:4958: thos pa chung yang 'bras bu thob pa srid do
NK121(ko)003:4960: gdams ngag med par bsam gtan byed na 'gal tshab can du 'gyur ro //
NK121(ko)003:4961: zhes gsungs pa yang lam pa'i sngon byung lta bu'o //
NK121(ko)003:4962: thos don ma bsgrub na gsung rab rgya mtsho lta
NK121(ko)003:4963: bu thugs su chud pa 'phags pa kun dga' bos
NK121(ko)003:4964: kyang re zhig 'bras bu ma thob pa bzhin no
NK121(ko)003:4965: // 'di yang ston pa'i nye gnas zhabs 'bring ba
NK121(ko)003:4966: yin pas bsgrub long med pa la phyis bka' bsdu
NK121(ko)003:4967: ba'i tshe 'od srungs chen po'i bkas spyo bas bre
NK121(ko)003:4969: bri dza'i bu rnams rab tu byung ba dgra bcom
NK121(ko)003:4970: thob pas slob dpon nyid slob pa lam zhugs yin
NK121(ko)003:4971: par shes nas bskul te dgra bcom thob par mdzad
NK121(ko)003:4972: do // 'adi'ang dper 'os te ma bsgrub na 'phags
NK121(ko)003:4973: pa kun dga' bo lta bus kyang 'bras bu mi
NK121(ko)003:4977: 15 gzhan yang shes bya ci tsam shes kyang rang
NK121(ko)003:4978: rgyud la phan pa med na sgrub pa'i bar chad
NK121(ko)003:4979: du 'gyur ba gsung rab kyi gzhung las 'di skad
NK121(ko)003:4980: 'byung ste / gal te mang du thos pa des
NK121(ko)003:4981: rgyags shing zhes ngar 'dzin la bsten nas thos pa
NK121(ko)003:4982: mang po'i yon tan des rang gi sems khengs pa
NK121(ko)003:4983: 'byung ste / dang / thos pas rgyags shing ste
NK121(ko)003:4984: rgyags par ma zad nga rgyal te gzhan brnyas shing
NK121(ko)003:4985: tshar gcod cing thos pas nyes ltung 'dag go snyam
NK121(ko)003:4986: nas tshul khrims mi bsrung na /
NK121(ko)003:4987: dge sbyong gi chos dang mi ldan pa sogs kyis
NK121(ko)003:4988: tshul khrims 'chal ba'i dbang gis ngan 'gro der 'gro
NK121(ko)003:4989: ste / de'i tshe thos pa mang pos de la skyob par byed mi nus te /
NK121(ko)003:4990: chos la bsten pa'i nga rgyal dang khro ba'i las tshan che bas so //
NK121(ko)003:4993: thos pas rgyags nas gus par mi 'gyur te //
NK121(ko)003:4994: rnam par 'gyed pa'i smra ba rnams la chags //
NK121(ko)003:4995: brjed par 'gyur zhing shes bzhin med par 'gyur //
NK121(ko)003:4996: smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go //
NK121(ko)003:4998: chos thams cad 'byung ba med par bstan pa'i mdo las /
NK121(ko)003:4999: chos kyi rang bzhin yongs su mi shes na //
NK121(ko)003:5000: tshig gi dam pas byang chub 'tshang mi rgya //
NK121(ko)003:5003: tshul khrims ldan dang mang du thos gyis la //
NK121(ko)003:5004: dam pa'i don gyi mu gcig shes par mdzod //
NK121(ko)003:5006: gzhan yang chos shes pas nga rgyal dang dregs pa'i
NK121(ko)003:5007: dbang gis dmyal bar skyes nas phra men bya dang
NK121(ko)003:5008: dregs pa brgyad du skye ste /
NK121(ko)003:5009: gang zhe na a ba glang mgo /
NK121(ko)003:5016: 'khren byed khyi'i mgo can te brgyad do //
NK121(ko)003:5017: de dag rang rang gi ngo bo'i sgo nas ming
NK121(ko)003:5018: btags pa la rus rigs ces pa srog chags kyi
NK121(ko)003:5019: rigs las rus rigs dmigs bu yin pa'am yang na
NK121(ko)003:5020: smig bu zhes pa'ang yod cing ming gzhan bye ma'i
NK121(ko)003:5021: myu gu dang bye khyug kyang zer /
NK121(ko)003:5022: chu chen gyi 'gram bye ma'i nang gnas bcas nas
NK121(ko)003:5023: 'dug pas sbal chung mjug ma ring po myur mgyogs
NK121(ko)003:5026: mang du thos pa'i gang zag ni ri'am rgya mtsho ltar nga rgyal che'o //
NK121(ko)003:5027: de ltar nga rgyal che ba ni ngan song du
NK121(ko)003:5028: bskal pa grangs med par sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur
NK121(ko)003:5029: ro // de las thar na yang 'dab chags bya
NK121(ko)003:5030: zhig tu skye bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa mang
NK121(ko)003:5031: ro // du gsungs / bdag cag ston pa 'di
NK121(ko)003:5032: nyid sngon bskal pa dpag med kyi dus su dge
NK121(ko)003:5033: slong chos zhes bya ba mkhas pa nga rgyal can
NK121(ko)003:5034: ro // du gsungs / du gyur tshe / dge
NK121(ko)003:5035: slong yon tan can zhig la 'dis chos mi shes
NK121(ko)003:5036: kyi zhes sogs kyis skur ba btab pas bskal pa
NK121(ko)003:5037: du mar lce la zhing rmo ba'i dmyal bar skyes
NK121(ko)003:5038: ro // du gsungs / du gyur tshe / /
NK121(ko)003:5039: tshe rabs du mar dud 'gro lce med pa sogs
NK121(ko)003:5040: ro // du gsungs / du gyur tshe / /
NK121(ko)003:5041: dang / mi lce med pa lkugs pa sogs su
NK121(ko)003:5042: skyes byang chub kyi sems brjed /
NK121(ko)003:5043: sangs rgyas pa'i tshe bdud kyi bar chad dang r+ts+wa
NK121(ko)003:5044: mis skur ba 'debs pa'ang de'i lhag ma yin gsungs
NK121(ko)003:5045: / de bzhin du sngon w+aa r+aa na s+air nags
NK121(ko)003:5046: su ma he lnga brgya'i khyu dpon gtum po ma
NK121(ko)003:5047: / rung ba zhig / ston pa'i thog tu rnga
NK121(ko)003:5048: ma gdengs te brgyug pa ston pas btul nas lhar
NK121(ko)003:5049: / rung ba zhig / skyes / de yang sngon
NK121(ko)003:5050: sangs rgyas 'od srung dus su dge slong sde snod
NK121(ko)003:5051: 'dzin pa mkhas pas snyems te rtsod pas gzhan tshar
NK121(ko)003:5052: bcad de nags kyi ma he 'dra ba khyed ci
NK121(ko)003:5054: lnga brgya po yang de dus de'i 'khor lnga bargya'o //
NK121(ko)003:5055: thos pas rgyags nas tshul khrims nyams na de lta bu dang /
NK121(ko)003:5056: thos pa shes pas 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i
NK121(ko)003:5057: lta ba dang ldan pa yang klu'i 'khor du skye
NK121(ko)003:5058: ba klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa las gsungs
NK121(ko)003:5059: / byang chub kyi sems brjed pa la'ang nga rgyal dang rgyags pa 'di ngan te /
NK121(ko)003:5060: sngon sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gi dus su bram
NK121(ko)003:5061: ze nor bzang zhes byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa
NK121(ko)003:5062: nga rgyal gyis rtsod pa la dga' ba zhig byang
NK121(ko)003:5063: chub kyi sems tshe rabs mang por brjed kyang sngon
NK121(ko)003:5064: byang chub kyi sems bskyed pas nam yang ngan song
NK121(ko)003:5066: gzhan yang chos shes nas ma bsgrub na theg pa chen po'i mdo rnams las 'di ltar gsungs te /
NK121(ko)003:5068: yang dag sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di //
NK121(ko)003:5069: thos pa tsam gyis mi 'grub bo //
NK121(ko)003:5070: dper na la la chu klung gis //
NK121(ko)003:5071: stobs med nan gyis khyer ba dag /
NK121(ko)003:5072: skom nas shi bar gyur pa bzhin //
NK121(ko)003:5073: ma bsgom chos kyang de dang 'dra //
NK121(ko)003:5074: ji ltar mnyen pa mkhas pa zhig /
NK121(ko)003:5075: skye bo mang po sgrol byed kyang //
NK121(ko)003:5076: rang nyid de na 'chi ba ltar //
NK121(ko)003:5077: ma bsgom chos kyang de dang 'dra //
NK121(ko)003:5078: ji ltar 'on pa rol mo mkhan //
NK121(ko)003:5079: gzhan dag de yis dga' byed kyang //
NK121(ko)003:5080: rang nyid kyis ni mi thos ltar //
NK121(ko)003:5081: ma bsgom chos kyang de dang 'dra //
NK121(ko)003:5083: de bzhin du skye bo skom gyis gdung bas chu
NK121(ko)003:5084: mthong ba dang thos pas skom mi sel ba ltar
NK121(ko)003:5085: / chos nyams su ma blangs na thos pa tsam
NK121(ko)003:5086: gyis las nyon gyis gdung ba mi sel bar gsungs
NK121(ko)003:5087: / / gtsug tor chen po'i mdo las /
NK121(ko)003:5088: mtha' yas 'dzin par yid gzhungs kyang //
NK121(ko)003:5089: ldog par bsam pas mtha' mar lhung //
NK121(ko)003:5090: rjes su 'khor ba ma yin nam //
NK121(ko)003:5092: skye bo gang zhig gzhan la sbyin pa chen po
NK121(ko)003:5093: btang nas bdag nyid ltog grir shi ba ltar gzhan
NK121(ko)003:5094: la chos kyi sbyin pa rgya chen po btang nas
NK121(ko)003:5095: rang nyid tha mal du 'chi ba dang /
NK121(ko)003:5096: mi bkres pas nyen pa zhig gzhan gyi kha zas
NK121(ko)003:5097: g.yos mkhan du gyur kyang rang la mi phan pa
NK121(ko)003:5098: ltar / gzhan la gdams ngag gis blang dor legs
NK121(ko)003:5099: par bstan nas tshim par byas te rang rgyud phongs
NK121(ko)003:5101: nad pa rnams kyis sman gtong mi nus shing mi shes pas phan tshun slob pa bzhin /
NK121(ko)003:5102: rang nyid chos kyi sman ma btung bas las nyon gyi nad las ma grol bzhin /
NK121(ko)003:5103: 'gro ba las nyon gyi nad pa gzhan las dam
NK121(ko)003:5104: pa'i chos kyi sman bstan pas grol thabs bshad pa
NK121(ko)003:5105: ste / mdze nad can gyis mdze nad can la
NK121(ko)003:5106: bya khyung gi rig sngags ston pa'i dpe ltar ro
NK121(ko)003:5108: nga yis rab tu bzang ba'i chos bshad la //
NK121(ko)003:5109: khyod kyis thos nas tshul bzhin ma bsgrub na //
NK121(ko)003:5110: nad pa sman gyi rkyal ba thogs na yang //
NK121(ko)003:5111: rang gi nad ni gso bar mi nus bzhin //
NK121(ko)003:5114: ma rgal bas ni bsgral mi nus //
NK121(ko)003:5115: ma grol bas ni sgrol mi nus //
NK121(ko)003:5116: long bas lam yang ston mi nus //
NK121(ko)003:5117: grol bas sgrol bar byed pa nus //
NK121(ko)003:5118: mig ldan long la lam ston nus //
NK121(ko)003:5120: gla mi khol po rnam gzhan gyi nor bgrangs shing
NK121(ko)003:5121: de la phan pa sgrub pa tsam las rang la
NK121(ko)003:5122: ci yang mi bdog pa ltar /
NK121(ko)003:5123: rang la spang rtogs kyi yon tan sna gcig med
NK121(ko)003:5124: par gzhan la sgrub thabs kyi rnam grangs du slob
NK121(ko)003:5125: pa dang / gzhan yang 'di skad du /
NK121(ko)003:5126: rang gi nyams su mi len pa'i //
NK121(ko)003:5127: dam chos zab rgyas kun btsal yang //
NK121(ko)003:5128: yug sa mo yi mda' gzhu bzhin //
NK121(ko)003:5129: 'tsho rdzi dka' la yas mi nus //
NK121(ko)003:5131: gzhan yang zang zing sogs kyi khe dang grags pa'i
NK121(ko)003:5132: phyir gzhan la chos 'chad pa ni rin po che
NK121(ko)003:5133: rnyed kyang des don mi bsgrub par slong mo byed
NK121(ko)003:5134: pa'i sprang po dang 'dra zhes gsungs /
NK121(ko)003:5135: 'dir dam pa'i chos rin po che gang zhig rnyed
NK121(ko)003:5136: na 'phral phug gi dbul ba sel ba nyid tshe
NK121(ko)003:5137: 'di'i khe grags tsam gyi ched du btsong ba'i don
NK121(ko)003:5138: te / sngon rgyal po kri kri'i bu mo gser phreng can gyi rmi lam ltar ro //
NK121(ko)003:5139: des na bsam sbyor dag pas chos 'chad nyan byed tshul 'od srung gi le'u las /
NK121(ko)003:5140: chos smra ba la gus dang bcas pa yin //
NK121(ko)003:5141: zang zing med cing rnyed dang bkur sti la //
NK121(ko)003:5142: re ba med cing tshig bcad mi sems par //
NK121(ko)003:5143: ji ltar thos pas chos rnams gzhan la ston //
NK121(ko)003:5145: chos sbyin nyon mongs med sems kyis //
NK121(ko)003:5146: mdo sogs yang dag ji bzhin ston //
NK121(ko)003:5150: 11 rgyu mtshan de'i phyir thos pa'i snying po don
NK121(ko)003:5151: la spyod par byed cing tshig la spyod pa'i phyir
NK121(ko)003:5152: min la / tshig gi don ston byed yin gyi
NK121(ko)003:5153: don dngos ni min zhing don dngos ni 'di yin
NK121(ko)003:5154: min la / te / don ni gser dang 'dra
NK121(ko)003:5155: la tshig ni gser 'tshol byed kyi sgron me dang
NK121(ko)003:5156: 'dra bas gser rnyed nas ni sgron me des ci
NK121(ko)003:5157: min la / te / zhig bya / gser lta
NK121(ko)003:5158: bu'i don la dpyad cing bsam nas nyams su myong
NK121(ko)003:5159: bar byas na gnas lugs don spyi myong ba nas
NK121(ko)003:5160: min la / te / zhig bya / / mthar
NK121(ko)003:5161: rang rig mngon sum skyes nas don dngos myong bar
NK121(ko)003:5162: min la / te / zhig bya / / 'gyur ro // lhag bsam bskul ba las /
NK121(ko)003:5163: bu ram shing shun snying po ci yang med //
NK121(ko)003:5164: dga' bar bya ba'i ro ni nang na 'dug /
NK121(ko)003:5165: shun pa zos pa'i mis ni bu ram ro //
NK121(ko)003:5166: zhim po rnyed par nus pa ma yin no //
NK121(ko)003:5167: ji ltar shun pa de bzhin smra ba ste //
NK121(ko)003:5168: ro lta bu ni 'di la don sems yin //
NK121(ko)003:5169: de lta bas na smra la dga' spong ste //
NK121(ko)003:5170: rtag tu bag yod byos la don soms shig /
NK121(ko)003:5172: de la shun pa lta bu ni tshig rjes 'brang
NK121(ko)003:5173: ba'i go ba dang ro myong ba lta bu ni
NK121(ko)003:5174: sems bskyed sogs mtshan nyid pa'o //
NK121(ko)003:5175: gtsug tor chen po'i mdo las /
NK121(ko)003:5176: rdul snyed kyi bskal bar dam pa'i chos kyi mdo sde klog cing kha ton byed pa bas /
NK121(ko)003:5177: nyin gcig gam mtshan gcig zag pa med pa'i shes
NK121(ko)003:5178: rab bsgom na bsod nams dpag tu med par che'o
NK121(ko)003:5179: // de ci'i zhe na skye shi las ring du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
NK121(ko)003:5181: tshig gi nyan bshad bskal ba'i bar du byas kyang
NK121(ko)003:5182: de las ni sems byung gi shes rab tsam las
NK121(ko)003:5183: rang rig pa'i ye shes myong ba ni med de
NK121(ko)003:5184: / rtog dpyod kyi grub mtha' chos nyid du zhi ba'i dgos pa la ma reg bar du /
NK121(ko)003:5185: rtog ge'i rigs pa rnon po can du mas khe
NK121(ko)003:5186: rngam phyed pa ni gang zag phal la chags sdang
NK121(ko)003:5187: sogs nyon mongs 'phel ba'i grogs su 'gyur te /
NK121(ko)003:5188: gu ru sangs rgyas gnyis pas /
NK121(ko)003:5189: chos bshad phal gyis dug lnga spel //
NK121(ko)003:5190: sgom chen bshad pa'i sgra la g.yeng //
NK121(ko)003:5191: bshad grwa skye bo'i gshag 'dris dus //
NK121(ko)003:5192: snying po'i bstan pa rlung la skur //
NK121(ko)003:5194: des na 'phags pa lha'i gzhung las 'byung ba ltar bya ste /
NK121(ko)003:5195: cung zad mthong na bzang 'gro ste //
NK121(ko)003:5196: yang dag mthong na gnas mchog la //
NK121(ko)003:5197: de phyir nang bdag bsam pa la //
NK121(ko)003:5198: mkhas rnams rtag tu dga' ba bskyed //
NK121(ko)003:5200: de'i phyir nang don snying po la mkhas na mkhas pa dngos gnas yin la /
NK121(ko)003:5201: don sgrub pa med par tshig mang po la mkhas na mkhas pa min te /
NK121(ko)003:5203: chos kyi dbyings shes na chos thams cad kyi mdo
NK121(ko)003:5204: dang rgyas pa yang shes pa yin no gsungs pas
NK121(ko)003:5205: / don la mkhas pa ni thos pa'i mchog yin zhing /
NK121(ko)003:5206: sgra phyir 'brang na rnam par mi rtog pa'i bar chad du 'gyur bar gsungs so //
NK121(ko)003:5207: de'i phyir phyi dang nang gis bsdus pa'i dngos po
NK121(ko)003:5208: rnams lan cig ma yin par yang yang gzhig cing
NK121(ko)003:5209: dpyod dang / dpyad stobs kyis drang ba'i gnas lugs
NK121(ko)003:5210: la nges pa phu thag chod pa mi skye mi
NK121(ko)003:5211: dpyod dang / srid la / 'on kyang kha phyir
NK121(ko)003:5212: bltas kyi thos pa'i tshig gi go yul dpe thog
NK121(ko)003:5213: tu 'chel ba min par nang blo gting rang rig
NK121(ko)003:5214: pa'i rnal 'byor dang ro gcig 'byung ba'o //
NK121(ko)003:5215: de'i tshe shes bya phyi'i gnas lugs dpe sogs kyis don spyi ngo sprod pa ltar ma yin par /
NK121(ko)003:5216: man ngag pas nang rang rig mngon sum du ngo
NK121(ko)003:5217: sprad pas tshegs med par dbyings rig lhun grub tu
NK121(ko)003:5219: dkon mchog brtsegs par lha'i bus zhus pa las /
NK121(ko)003:5220: bder gshegs bstan la dad pa rnyed gyur pa'i //
NK121(ko)003:5221: mkhas pa rnams kyis rig pa'i rnal 'byor spyod //
NK121(ko)003:5222: sgra la 'chel zhing 'dug par ma byed par //
NK121(ko)003:5223: chos thob gyur nas rtag tu nan tan gyis //
NK121(ko)003:5225: de ltar lung dang rigs pa du mas gtan la
NK121(ko)003:5226: phab pa'i don myur du rtogs pa la bla ma'i
NK121(ko)003:5227: man ngag la bsten dgos pa mdo rgyud yongs la
NK121(ko)003:5228: grags pa dang / do ha mdzod las /
NK121(ko)003:5229: gang zhig bla ma'i man ngag bdud rtsi'i chu //
NK121(ko)003:5230: gdung sel bdud rtsi ngoms par mi 'thung bas //
NK121(ko)003:5231: de ni bstan bcos don med mya ngan gyi //
NK121(ko)003:5232: thang la skom pas gdung ste shi bar zad //
NK121(ko)003:5234: 'dir rang rig ces bya ba bem po min pa'i
NK121(ko)003:5235: don dang rnal 'byor pa rang la mngon sum gyur
NK121(ko)003:5236: pas so // 'di tshad ma gzhan gyis sgrub tu'ang
NK121(ko)003:5237: med cing tshad ma gzhan gyis gnod pa'ang med par
NK121(ko)003:5238: pas so // 'dod / kun gzhi'i rnam shes gsal rig dang gcig gam snyam na /
NK121(ko)003:5239: gcig kyang chog ste glo bur gyi dri ma dang bcas pa'i kun gzhi dang /
NK121(ko)003:5240: ngo bo rnam par dag pa chos sku zhes ldog pas phye'o //
NK121(ko)003:5241: 'on kyang rnam rig pa'i rang rig la grub matha'i
NK121(ko)003:5242: blo skyon yod 'dir rang bzhin med par 'dod pa'i
NK121(ko)003:5243: khyad par ro // sems dang sems nyid gnyis las
NK121(ko)003:5244: 'di ni sems nyid de rnam par mi rtog cing
NK121(ko)003:5245: rang ngo mi rmongs pa dang sems ni yul la
NK121(ko)003:5247: rang rig yul la mi 'phro zhing don gyi rnam
NK121(ko)003:5248: pa myong ba rang rig la thug kyang rang rig
NK121(ko)003:5249: don gyis bslang pa med do //
NK121(ko)003:5251: sdug bsngal rang rig nyid du mthong nas ni //
NK121(ko)003:5253: snang ba yul dang rig pa yul can de gnyis rang bzhin med par mnyam pa ste /
NK121(ko)003:5254: snang rig stong gsum dbyer med pa bden gnyis zung
NK121(ko)003:5255: 'jug chen po mdo rgyud kun gyi dgongs pa nyag
NK121(ko)003:5258: 10 gang zag rmongs pa kha cig bstan pa lnga
NK121(ko)003:5259: brgya tha ma rtags tsam gyi dus deng sang sgrub
NK121(ko)003:5261: snyigs dus kyi gang zag blo dman pas zab mo'i
NK121(ko)003:5262: don mi rtogs zer bas rang gi rgyud la dpags
NK121(ko)003:5263: nas rgyal ba'i bka' dang gang zag la chabs gcig
NK121(ko)003:5264: skur ba 'debs pa yod pa yin yang /
NK121(ko)003:5265: las dang smon lam gyi skal ba dang ldan na
NK121(ko)003:5266: gang zag bzang ngan med par bsgrubs na rtogs par
NK121(ko)003:5267: snang ste / sher phyin sum brgya par /
NK121(ko)003:5268: rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya'i tha mal
NK121(ko)003:5269: dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig par 'gyur
NK121(ko)003:5270: ba na / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
NK121(ko)003:5271: po tshul khrims dang ldan pa yon tan dang ldan
NK121(ko)003:5272: pa shes rab dang ldan pa dag 'byung ste /
NK121(ko)003:5274: bdag cag gi ston pa nyid sngon drang srong mchog
NK121(ko)003:5275: ces bya bas khrag gis snag tsha byas pags pas
NK121(ko)003:5276: shog gu byas nas chos btsal zhing /
NK121(ko)003:5277: mun bskal zhig la sangs rgyas mang po spyan drangs
NK121(ko)003:5278: te chos zhus te gzhan la'ang bstan pa des na
NK121(ko)003:5279: / chos la snying nas don gnyer gyi mos 'dun
NK121(ko)003:5280: yod pa la ni sangs rgyas mya ngan las mi
NK121(ko)003:5281: 'da' zhing chos kyang mi nub ces bya /
NK121(ko)003:5282: bsam pa phun sum tshogs shing dad pa yod na
NK121(ko)003:5283: mun bskal du skyes kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhal ston
NK121(ko)003:5284: / chos kyi gter dang ri sul dang shing gi nang du bcug pa dag kyang yod de /
NK121(ko)003:5285: chos kyi glegs bam du byas pa dag kyang lag tu 'ong ngo zhes mdo las bshad /
NK121(ko)003:5286: dper na gter chos 'di lta bu'o //
NK121(ko)003:5287: dus kyi tha ma la dge ba sgrub pa phan yon lhag par che zhing /
NK121(ko)003:5288: 'og phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+g+aa'i klung gi
NK121(ko)003:5289: bye ma snyed bdun cu rtsa gnyis 'das pa na
NK121(ko)003:5290: / sangs rgyas 'od zer gyi rgyal po'i zhing khams
NK121(ko)003:5291: snang ldan du bskal pa bcur bsam gtan bsgom pa
NK121(ko)003:5292: bas mi mjed kyi zhing 'dir snga dro gcig la
NK121(ko)003:5293: byams pa sogs bsgom pa bsod nams che ba mdo
NK121(ko)003:5294: / las / tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis zhus pa las /
NK121(ko)003:5295: shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs dag par
NK121(ko)003:5296: bskal pa brgya stong du tshangs par spyod pa spyad
NK121(ko)003:5297: pa bas / su dag byams pa'i sems kyis shin tu 'dir //
NK121(ko)003:5298: skad cig spyod na 'di ni khyad par 'phags //
NK121(ko)003:5300: gzhan yang 'di ltar bslab par bya ste /
NK121(ko)003:5301: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad bden pa bzhir dril
NK121(ko)003:5302: te zhib tu phyes nas bsgrub na dpag tu med
NK121(ko)003:5303: kyang / nyan thos lhag bcas kyi phung po sdug bsngal yin yang kun 'byung min la /
NK121(ko)003:5304: gzhan so so'i skye bo'i phung po lnga po nyid sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung gnyis ka yin pas /
NK121(ko)003:5305: phung po la bdag ces btags pa de ming tsam
NK121(ko)003:5306: las dngos po med pas de la bdag go nga'o
NK121(ko)003:5307: snyam du bden par mi 'dzin par rang bzhin med
NK121(ko)003:5308: par goms na gang zag gi bdag med dang /
NK121(ko)003:5309: phung po lnga po de mi rtag pa dang sdug
NK121(ko)003:5310: bsngal ba dang lus mi gtsang ba dang ngo bo
NK121(ko)003:5311: med pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa gzugs brnyan gyi
NK121(ko)003:5312: rnam pa kho na yid la byas par goms na
NK121(ko)003:5313: / chos kyi bdag med pa ste bdag med de
NK121(ko)003:5314: rtogs pa'i shes rab gnyis ni lam gyi bden pa
NK121(ko)003:5315: yin zhing des phung po la bdag gnyis su bden
NK121(ko)003:5317: des na phung po la zhen cing chags pa'i nyon
NK121(ko)003:5318: mongs pa spangs des kun nas bslang ba'i las kyang
NK121(ko)003:5319: 'du mi byed pas 'gog pa la 'jug par 'gyur
NK121(ko)003:5320: ro // de la snying rje dang sems bskyed kyis
NK121(ko)003:5321: zin na tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba
NK121(ko)003:5322: des na mang du spros pas zhum na de tsam
NK121(ko)003:5323: ro // gyis chog go // dper na nyan thos
NK121(ko)003:5324: chos srung sde ba kha cig bden pa mngon rtogs
NK121(ko)003:5325: gcig tu 'dod de sdug bsngal shes pa kho nas
NK121(ko)003:5326: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs pas so //
NK121(ko)003:5327: zhes rnam pa so sor mi phye bar sdug bsngal
NK121(ko)003:5328: la bdag med par shes na thams cad bdag med
NK121(ko)003:5329: par shes pa'am / bzhi po la bdag med pa'i
NK121(ko)003:5330: rnam pa gcig po bsgom na bzhi po mthong ba'i
NK121(ko)003:5331: par shes pa'am / don no // bka' sde snod
NK121(ko)003:5332: gsum po bshad nas tshul bzhin mnyan par byas kyang
NK121(ko)003:5333: las dang skal ba med na tha snyad kho na
NK121(ko)003:5334: 'chad nyan bgyis pa las stong nyid kyi don mi
NK121(ko)003:5335: par shes pa'am / don no // rtogs so //
NK121(ko)003:5336: skal ldan shes rab chen po kha cig tshigs su
NK121(ko)003:5337: bcad pa res kyang don rtogs pa yod /
NK121(ko)003:5338: kha cig sangs rgyas dngos byon nas chos kyi 'khor
NK121(ko)003:5339: lo bskor ba ma thos pa'am thos kyang sgrub pa
NK121(ko)003:5340: med pas ma rtogs pa yod pas so //
NK121(ko)003:5341: gzhan yang dam pa'i chos kyi theg pa gsum nas
NK121(ko)003:5342: dgu la sogs pa yang gdul bya gang zag bye
NK121(ko)003:5343: brag mi 'dra ba khams dang mos pa dang snying
NK121(ko)003:5344: rje dang shes rab che chung gi dbang gsum la
NK121(ko)003:5346: kun la gcig gis chog pa min zhing gcig la thams cad dgos pa'ang min pas /
NK121(ko)003:5347: sgrub pa pos kyang rang gi nyams tshod dang sbyar
NK121(ko)003:5348: la khams kyis gang ci tsam lcogs pa la 'jug
NK121(ko)003:5349: par bya ste / khams dang 'tshams pas bsgrub sla zhing 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
NK121(ko)003:5350: gdul bya'i rgyud rim par smin pa la byis pa
NK121(ko)003:5351: zas kyis gso ba dang nor bu sbyong ba'i dpe
NK121(ko)003:5353: de ltar min par rang gis mi lcogs bzhin du
NK121(ko)003:5354: gong ma'i chos la re nas gong ma khas blangs
NK121(ko)003:5355: pas ni mthar de spong bar 'gyur bas /
NK121(ko)003:5356: thang stong sdig pa rang gis blangs pas dmyal bar skye zhes mdo sde'i gzhung las 'byung ngo //
NK121(ko)003:5357: 'dir chos ston pa pos kyang snod yin min mngon shes kyi brtags nas ston dgos kyi /
NK121(ko)003:5358: gzhan du na theg chen gyi snod ldan la theg dman ston pa dang /
NK121(ko)003:5359: theg dman rigs la theg chen ston pa sogs ni
NK121(ko)003:5360: chos spang blang du 'gyur zhing byang sems las dang
NK121(ko)003:5361: po pa la rtsa ltung brgyad las snod min la
NK121(ko)003:5362: zab mo bstan pa'i pham pa dang /
NK121(ko)003:5363: gzhan yang so thar spong ba dang theg chen las
NK121(ko)003:5364: bzlog pa'i pham pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul
NK121(ko)003:5365: ba yin par 'od srung gis zhus pa las gsungs
NK121(ko)003:5366: so // 'o na mngon shes med pas ji ltar
NK121(ko)003:5367: bya snyam na thabs du mas yun ring du brtags
NK121(ko)003:5368: nas shes na chog mod kyang las dang po la
NK121(ko)003:5369: mngon shes med cing rang rgyud ma smin pas gzhan
NK121(ko)003:5371: dang po rang rgyud sbyong zhing mngon shes bsgrub nas
NK121(ko)003:5372: gzhan don bya ba don la gnas shing dkon brtsegs
NK121(ko)003:5373: kyi lung sngar drangs pa ltar ro //
NK121(ko)003:5375: 'phags pa nye sdes 'khor 'jog par brtsam pa la
NK121(ko)003:5376: bcom ldan 'das kyi nye sdes thog ma nyid nas
NK121(ko)003:5377: 'khor bsdu bar sems so zhes gsungs nas bkag par
NK121(ko)003:5379: sems g.yeng pas ni bdag gi don yang 'grub par mi 'gyur na gzhan gyi don lta ci smos /
NK121(ko)003:5380: de'i phyir sems g.yeng ba'i go skabs ni 'ga' tsam yang dbye bar mi bya'o //
NK121(ko)003:5381: zhes sogs gsungs pa ni dang po mngon shes la sogs pa bsgrub dgos pa'i don no //
NK121(ko)003:5382: des na byang chub sems 'grel las /
NK121(ko)003:5383: gzhan don las la mthu med kyang //
NK121(ko)003:5384: de yi bsam pa rtag tu bya //
NK121(ko)003:5385: gang la bsam pa de yod pa //
NK121(ko)003:5386: de ni de la don gyis zhugs //
NK121(ko)003:5390: 6 theg pa'i rang bzhin ni shes rab dang thabs snying rje kho na yin par blta ste /
NK121(ko)003:5391: de yang bdag dang sangs rgyas gnyis gnas snang kun
NK121(ko)003:5392: tu dbyer med par rtogs pa shes rab yin la
NK121(ko)003:5393: / sems can kun la bu gcig pa la mas
NK121(ko)003:5394: ji ltar bya ba bzhin du byams pa dang snying
NK121(ko)003:5395: rje ba ni thabs yin la /
NK121(ko)003:5396: thabs dang shes rab de gnyis che chung gi dbang
NK121(ko)003:5397: gis theg pa'i khyad par mtho dman du bstan pa
NK121(ko)003:5398: yin no // nyan rang la'ang thabs dang shes rab
NK121(ko)003:5399: yod kyang che chung gi khyad par las dman pa
NK121(ko)003:5400: la dgag sgra sbyar nas mdo sdud par /
NK121(ko)003:5401: thabs med shes rab bral bas nyan thos nyid du lhung /
NK121(ko)003:5403: byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yang shes
NK121(ko)003:5404: rab che bas yin gyi shes rab dman pa la
NK121(ko)003:5405: thabs mang po med cing thabs kyis 'ching ba nyid
NK121(ko)003:5407: 'od srung shes rab dang ldan pa rnams ni thabs kyis rnam par grol lo //
NK121(ko)003:5408: shes rab dang mi ldan pa rnams ni rabs kyis yongs su 'ching ngo //
NK121(ko)003:5411: snying rje dang bral stong pa nyid zhugs gang //
NK121(ko)003:5412: des ni lam mchog rnyed pa ma yin no //
NK121(ko)003:5413: 'on te snying rje 'ba' zhig bsgom na yang //
NK121(ko)003:5414: 'khor ba 'dir gnas thar pa yod dam ci //
NK121(ko)003:5415: gang dag gnyis po sbyor bar nus pa de //
NK121(ko)003:5416: 'khor bar mi gnas mya ngan 'das mi gnas //
NK121(ko)003:5418: de'i phyir gang zag gang zhig thabs shes khyad par
NK121(ko)003:5419: can de gnyis dang mi ldan zhing theg chen gyi
NK121(ko)003:5420: mdo sde zab mo bklag pa'i phan yon mthong bas
NK121(ko)003:5422: sems bskyed bcos ma re thob kyang de'i bslab bya
NK121(ko)003:5423: rnams ji bzhin sgrub par mi nus par bdag ni
NK121(ko)003:5424: theg pa chen po'i zhes khas 'che ba ni /
NK121(ko)003:5425: dper na long ba sprang po zhig gis nga nyid
NK121(ko)003:5426: rgyal po yin no zhes zer ba bzhin du rdzun
NK121(ko)003:5427: kho na nyid du zad de /
NK121(ko)003:5428: sa snying 'khor lo bcu pa las /
NK121(ko)003:5429: tshul khrims nyams pa sdig la dga' ba can //
NK121(ko)003:5430: theg pa chen po'i yon tan mchog thos nas //
NK121(ko)003:5431: khe dang grags phyir theg chen khas che ba //
NK121(ko)003:5432: bong bu seng ge'i pags pa gyon pa bzhin //
NK121(ko)003:5434: des na brtag dpyad med par chos bstan na gdul
NK121(ko)003:5435: ba'i rgyud chud zos su 'gyur nyen che bas rgyud
NK121(ko)003:5436: tshod dang 'tsham pa'i sgo nas bstan par bya ste
NK121(ko)003:5438: mkhas pa chos kyi sbyin pa spyod pa dag /
NK121(ko)003:5439: snod bzhin theg pa gsum gyi chos ston to //
NK121(ko)003:5440: theg pa gzhan dag de la ston mi byed //
NK121(ko)003:5441: thos nas de la 'phya zhing skur mi 'gyur //
NK121(ko)003:5442: dbang po snod bzhin dam pa'i chos ston gyi //
NK121(ko)003:5443: dbang po snod min dag la ma yin no //
NK121(ko)003:5444: so sor ji ltar ci la mos pa bzhin //
NK121(ko)003:5445: de dang de yi chos ston mgu bar byed //
NK121(ko)003:5447: +aar+ya de bas kyang de ltar gsungs pa gong du song /
NK121(ko)003:5450: 2 rang gi rgyud dang 'tsham pa la 'jug dgos
NK121(ko)003:5451: pa rgyu mtshan de bas na rgyu'i theg pa dang
NK121(ko)003:5453: gang zag kyang 'og ma rnams kyis gong ma sgrub mi nus bzhin du de khas blangs pa las /
NK121(ko)003:5454: 'og ma so so rang rang gi gzhung bzhin du shin tu 'bad par rigs so //
NK121(ko)003:5455: gong ma khas len mi nus pa rnams kyis kyang
NK121(ko)003:5456: gong ma'i chos la rgyab kyis mi phyogs par theg
NK121(ko)003:5457: pa chen po ni shin tu zab ches pas rang
NK121(ko)003:5458: gi blor ma shong ba'o snyam nas mos 'dun dang
NK121(ko)003:5459: / nam zhig 'di lta bu sgrub pa'i skal ba
NK121(ko)003:5460: dang ldan par gyur cig ces smon lam dang sems
NK121(ko)003:5462: 'di ni mi rigs pa'o zhes zer na lta ci smos /
NK121(ko)003:5463: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ched du bstan pa'o zhes zer ba dang /
NK121(ko)003:5464: 'di ni nyan thos rnams kyi ched du gsungs pa'o zer na chos spong ba dang /
NK121(ko)003:5465: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i bka'
NK121(ko)003:5466: la la ni bzang bar 'du shes la la ni
NK121(ko)003:5467: ngan par 'du shes na chos spong ba dang /
NK121(ko)003:5468: chos spang ba des chos spangs pas de bzhin gshegs pa la skur ba 'debs pa yin /
NK121(ko)003:5469: dge 'dun la ngan du brjod pa yin zhes rnam par 'thag pa bsdus pa'i mdo las gsungs /
NK121(ko)003:5470: chos spong ba'i las sgrib ni shin tu phra ba gong du'ang cung zad bshad de /
NK121(ko)003:5471: zla ba sgron me'i mdo las /
NK121(ko)003:5473: mchod rten thams cad bshig byed pas //
NK121(ko)003:5474: gang gis mdo sde spong byed pa'i //
NK121(ko)003:5475: sdig pa de ni ches khyad 'phags //
NK121(ko)003:5476: gang gis gang+g+aa'i bye snyed kyi //
NK121(ko)003:5477: dgra bcom bsad par gyur pa bas //
NK121(ko)003:5478: gang gis mdo sde spong byed pa'i //
NK121(ko)003:5479: sdig pa de ni ches khyad 'phags //
NK121(ko)003:5482: zab mo'i chos ni ston pa la //
NK121(ko)003:5483: gal te mos par ma gyur kyang //
NK121(ko)003:5484: skur ba dag ni mi gdab ste //
NK121(ko)003:5485: chos nyid bsam mi khyab dran bya //
NK121(ko)003:5486: zhes gsungs pa la bsam par bya'o //
NK121(ko)003:5489: 4 gsang sngags rdo rje'i theg pa ni zab pa las kyang ches zab pa'i chos yin zhing /
NK121(ko)003:5490: gang zag kyang dbang po rab mchog tu gyur pa rnams kyis bsgrub bya yin la /
NK121(ko)003:5491: de la zhugs pa'i skyes bu de yang ni thun
NK121(ko)003:5492: mong ma yin pa'i khe nyen gnyis dang ldan pa
NK121(ko)003:5493: ste / sgrub pa med cing dam tshig nyams na
NK121(ko)003:5494: shin tu thar dka' ba'i rdo rje'i dmyal ba chen
NK121(ko)003:5495: po nyid du mtshams med par 'gro ba dang /
NK121(ko)003:5496: sgrub cing dam tshig bsrung na sangs rgyas rdo rje
NK121(ko)003:5497: 'chang gi sa ru the tshom med par skye ste
NK121(ko)003:5498: / de gnyis las skyes gzhan gsum pa ni med ces bshad do //
NK121(ko)003:5499: de'i phyir rgyud las bshad pa'i lta ba dang spyod
NK121(ko)003:5500: pa thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa rnams
NK121(ko)003:5501: dang phyi nang gsang ba'i dam tshig dang ldan cing
NK121(ko)003:5502: / sgrub sde so so'i gzhung las bshad pa bzhin
NK121(ko)003:5503: de la shin tu brtson par byas pas ni tshe
NK121(ko)003:5504: / 'adi'am / 'chi kha bar do gang rung du
NK121(ko)003:5505: gegs med par sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang gi sar
NK121(ko)003:5506: 'gro ba rgyud sde mtha' dag las gsungs /
NK121(ko)003:5507: dam tshig ma nyams na sgrub pa med kyang skye ba bcu drug las mi 'gyang bar gsungs so //
NK121(ko)003:5509: lta ba mi ldan spyod pa dang //
NK121(ko)003:5510: spyod pa mi ldan lta ba gnyis //
NK121(ko)003:5511: 'di ni gsang sngags dam sri ste //
NK121(ko)003:5512: mnar med sems can dmyal bar skye //
NK121(ko)003:5514: dam tshig dag dang mi ldan na //
NK121(ko)003:5517: tshe yi dus byas dmyal bar 'gro //
NK121(ko)003:5519: dbang mtshan nyid pa thob pa sngon du song nas
NK121(ko)003:5520: lta spyod dam tshig dang ldan pas sgrub pa ni
NK121(ko)003:5522: de gsum dang mi ldan cing bsgrub pa la g.yel
NK121(ko)003:5523: zhing sngags tsam la 'chel nas spyod pa 'dod phyogs
NK121(ko)003:5524: tsam bag med du spyod na nges par dmyal bar
NK121(ko)003:5527: phyag rgya la ni bsgrod pa dang //
NK121(ko)003:5528: ye shes mi ldan ye shes tshul //
NK121(ko)003:5529: the tshom med par dmyal bar 'gro //
NK121(ko)003:5532: chags can ye shes 'dod pa yis //
NK121(ko)003:5533: rtag tu 'dod yon rnam lnga bsten //
NK121(ko)003:5534: bu mo ut+pala mthing kha'i mdog /
NK121(ko)003:5535: rnyed nas 'dod pas rab tu mchod //
NK121(ko)003:5536: ces gsungs pa de yang lta ba bdag med gnyis dang 'khor 'das mnyam nyid /
NK121(ko)003:5537: thabs khyad par can snying rje chen po la sogs
NK121(ko)003:5538: pas ma zin na ngan song log par ltung ba'i
NK121(ko)003:5539: rgyu yin zhes 'gro mgon bsod nams rtse mos rgyud
NK121(ko)003:5540: sde spyi'i rnam bshad las gsungs /
NK121(ko)003:5541: de bas na gsang sngags spyod pa rnams kyis sdar
NK121(ko)003:5542: ma'i pang du sbrul 'ong ba bzhin du nyams pa'i
NK121(ko)003:5543: nyes dmigs dang bsrungs ba'i phan yon la bsams nas
NK121(ko)003:5546: he ru ka dpal bzung byas na //
NK121(ko)003:5549: rnal 'byor ma kun tu spyod pa'i rgyud las /
NK121(ko)003:5550: gzhan yang phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe //
NK121(ko)003:5551: dus mthar dngos grub mi thob ste //
NK121(ko)003:5552: chos 'di de ltar shes nas ni //
NK121(ko)003:5553: bsam pa tha mas rdzogs byed yin //
NK121(ko)003:5555: da ltar gsang sngags sgrub pa'i dus dang 'grub pa'i
NK121(ko)003:5556: dus yin par gsungs pa'i phyir sngags la zhugs nas
NK121(ko)003:5557: tshul bzhin bsgrub par bya rigs so //
NK121(ko)003:5558: sngar rtsa ba'i sa bcad gsum pa tha ma slob
NK121(ko)003:5559: dpon nyid khengs skyung zhing dge rtsa bsngo ba la
NK121(ko)003:5565: de ltar bdag gis chos 'chad nyan byed pa spyi
NK121(ko)003:5566: la bskul ba lags pas mtshang la rgol ba lta
NK121(ko)003:5567: bu'i brjod pa cung zad thal drag na yang /
NK121(ko)003:5568: 'di ltar bdag sems pa 'jig rten sems pa sems
NK121(ko)003:5569: can gyi las 'bras sems pa sangs rgyas dang byang
NK121(ko)003:5570: chub sems dpa'i spyod yul sems pa ste /
NK121(ko)003:5571: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas de lta bu las /
NK121(ko)003:5572: bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod yul bsam las
NK121(ko)003:5573: 'das pa zab mo'i don la spyod pa rnams dang
NK121(ko)003:5574: / gang zag gi gnas snang yang shes par dka'
NK121(ko)003:5575: bas thabs la mkhas pa'i mdzad spyod nges pa dang
NK121(ko)003:5576: ma nges par snang ba'i rgyal sras byang chub sems
NK121(ko)003:5577: dpa' rnams la skur ba btab pa dang 'dra ba'i
NK121(ko)003:5578: / phyir / de lta bu la rmongs pa bdag
NK121(ko)003:5579: gis bskul ba min zhing bskul bar mi 'os kyang
NK121(ko)003:5580: / phyir / / bdag rang dang 'dra ba'i rmongs
NK121(ko)003:5581: pa 'ga' la phan srid snyam nas chos 'di bgyis
NK121(ko)003:5583: gzhung 'di bgyis pa la 'gal 'khrul gyi nongs par gyur pa ci mchis pa rnams /
NK121(ko)003:5584: 'phags pa mchog rnams dang rnam dpyod dang ldan pa'i
NK121(ko)003:5585: mkhas pa'i dbang po rnams la snying nas bzod par
NK121(ko)003:5587: bdag gi lhag bsam dag pas brtsams pa'i dge rtsa
NK121(ko)003:5588: 'dis ni 'gro ba kun gyi don gzhung las ji
NK121(ko)003:5589: skad bshad pa bzhin du bsgrub nas /
NK121(ko)003:5590: ring por mi thogs par zhi bde thar pa mchog gi go 'phang thob par shog cig ces so //
NK121(ko)003:5592: theg pa chen po'i rnal 'byor la 'jug pa'i thabs
NK121(ko)003:5593: bye brag tu phye ba slob dpon a ro ye
NK121(ko)003:5596: rgyal bstan dbang chen gser gyi bye snyed las //
NK121(ko)003:5597: bden pa rnam bzhi rin chen lhun po gang //
NK121(ko)003:5598: skal bzang mig stong ldan pa'i 'bab stegs te //
NK121(ko)003:5599: grong khyer gsum gyi dga' tshal mchog tu 'khrungs //
NK121(ko)003:5600: rnam bshad snang brnyan sgyu ma'i do shal la //
NK121(ko)003:5601: bden gsung lung gi zur brgyan mdzes 'bar ba //
NK121(ko)003:5602: rigs dang lang tsho pad+ma phyes 'dra ba'i //
NK121(ko)003:5603: mig gi longs spyod mdza' bar 'gyur lags grangs //
NK121(ko)003:5604: yun ring 'phrad par dka' ba dam chos mdzod //
NK121(ko)003:5605: rgyas mdzad dam pa'i bya ba rnam gsum gyi //
NK121(ko)003:5606: rgyal rnga dus mthar bsgrags pas 'og min gyi //
NK121(ko)003:5607: lha rnams dgyes pa'i me tog cha ra du 'beb //
NK121(ko)003:5608: de tshe nam mkha'i gos kyis sdig to'i bzhin //
NK121(ko)003:5609: sgrib gyin snying la mi mthun rtog pa yi //
NK121(ko)003:5610: mya ngan gyis gzir rang dag'i nags tshal du //
NK121(ko)003:5611: gom 'gros 'khyol la phyogs par mi 'gyur ram //
NK121(ko)003:5612: dbyar rnga'i gdangs la sdod pa'i mgrin sngon rnams //
NK121(ko)003:5613: char sprin lhung lhung 'khrigs tshe gar gyis rtse //
NK121(ko)003:5614: de bzhin rnam dpyod ldan rnams cig char du //
NK121(ko)003:5615: chos la dga' ba'i 'dzum ris cis mi ngom //
NK121(ko)003:5616: rigs lam zla 'od yun du dpyad pa'i mthar //
NK121(ko)003:5617: shes rab grogs kyis bsgyur ba'i don gcig nyid //
NK121(ko)003:5618: nges par gzigs la rgyal rnams mgrin gcig tu //
NK121(ko)003:5619: basngagasa par mdzad na gzhan gyis ci zhig smos //
NK121(ko)003:5620: 'phags mchog mi yi zol du byon pa yis //
NK121(ko)003:5621: dbang po'i gzhu la ngal stegs mi 'cha' bar //
NK121(ko)003:5622: smon lam dus su smin pa'i rnam thar gyis //
NK121(ko)003:5623: bya ba mchog la brtson pa'i ngo mtshar rmad //
NK121(ko)003:5624: srid na grags pa'i lha chen 'bum phrag gis //
NK121(ko)003:5625: chos dung lan cig sgrogs pa'i char mi nye //
NK121(ko)003:5626: chos spyod kun 'dus kun dga' ra ba gang //
NK121(ko)003:5627: ya rabs kun gyis 'jug ngogs lags par 'tshal //
NK121(ko)003:5628: de phyir skye 'gro'i phan bde ji snyed pa //
NK121(ko)003:5629: thub bstan yid bzhin nor mchog las byung ba //
NK121(ko)003:5630: 'di gcig bstan 'dzin yongs kyi thugs mthun pas //
NK121(ko)003:5631: srog las gces par 'dzin pa de gang zhig /
NK121(ko)003:5632: dam pa du ma'i zhal gyi bdud rtsi'i rgyun //
NK121(ko)003:5633: rang blos ngoms par myong ba'i zegs ma rnams //
NK121(ko)003:5634: gang la dmigs pa bstan pa'i gsos sman du //
NK121(ko)003:5635: lhag bsam dag pa'i yig gzugs spel ba 'dis //
NK121(ko)003:5636: rnam dkar dge ba chu thigs tsam srid na //
NK121(ko)003:5637: bzang spyod rgya mtsho'i dpal dang lhan cig tu //
NK121(ko)003:5638: smon pa'i bye brag rdul gyi grangs snyed kyis //
NK121(ko)003:5639: 'byung po'i rten ma bzhin du khyab par gyur //
NK121(ko)003:5640: rdo rje 'chang dngos dus kyi 'gro khams dang //
NK121(ko)003:5641: rjes mthun sprul pa'i rol mdzad bstan 'gro'i gnyen //
NK121(ko)003:5642: bshad sgrub rgyal mtshan mthon po sgreng bzhin du //
NK121(ko)003:5643: 'gyur med mkha' dang mnyam par bzhugs gyur cig /
NK121(ko)003:5644: rgyud gtsang 'dul ba'i kun spyod ngur smrig 'chang //
NK121(ko)003:5645: tshul min rtog pa zhi ba'i legs bshad la //
NK121(ko)003:5646: nyin mtshan rab dag'i snang ba 'gog med du //
NK121(ko)003:5647: nyams su bzhes pa'i 'dus sde 'phel bar gyur //
NK121(ko)003:5648: chos tshul rgyang grags 'bar ba'i rol mo yis //
NK121(ko)003:5649: 'gal zla 'byung po'i tshogs kyi mgo 'phang dang //
NK121(ko)003:5650: bgegs ngan gnyis 'thung dregs pa'i spobs pa bcas //
NK121(ko)003:5651: rang tshugs 'dzin pa med par zhig gyur cig /
NK121(ko)003:5652: bkra shis ngo mtshar bye ba 'byung ba'i dpal //
NK121(ko)003:5653: dpal ldan thos bsam sgom pa dge ba'i mchog6 /
NK121(ko)003:5654: mchog gsum basngagasa pa'i dge legs ji snyed gang //
NK121(ko)003:5655: gang yang phyogs dus kun tu shis gyur cig /
NK121(ko)003:5657: 3 gangs ri'i khrod kyi rdo rje 'chang gnyis pa'i yang srid rin po che /
NK121(ko)003:5658: dpal ldan rdzong gsar gyi rgyal bstan yongs kyi bdag
NK121(ko)003:5659: po gang gi zhal snga nas gzhung 'di la 'grel
NK121(ko)003:5661: rten gsum gyis mtshon pa'i gnang skyes gya nom pa bcas pas bskul bar mdzad kyang /
NK121(ko)003:5662: ngos nyid ni na tshod shin tu smin thog 'byung
NK121(ko)003:5663: 'khrugs me ltar 'bar dbang po rab tu 'thib kyang
NK121(ko)003:5664: / skyes mchog de'i bka' cis kyang ldog ma spobs par /
NK121(ko)003:5665: skyabs mgon dge dbon rin po che sogs dam pa
NK121(ko)003:5666: du ma'i zhal gyi bdud rtsi thob pa thub bstan
NK121(ko)003:5667: bsod nams chos 'grub bam bshad sgrub bstan pa'i rgyal
NK121(ko)003:5669: lo grangs bdun cu don gsum dus su yid la gang shar spyi brtol gyis bris pa /
NK121(ko)003:5670: 'di la 'gal 'khrul nongs pa ci mchis dam pa yongs la snying nas bshags so //
NK121(ko)003:5672: mkhas pa chen po a ro yi //
NK121(ko)003:5673: bstan bcos theg chen tshul 'jug gi //
NK121(ko)003:5675: spar du bskrun pa'i dge tshogs kyis //
NK121(ko)003:5676: rgyal bstan dar zhing rgyas pa dang //
NK121(ko)003:5677: bdag gzhan skye ba thams cad du //
NK121(ko)003:5678: theg mchog lam dang mi 'bral zhing //
NK121(ko)003:5679: spangs rtogs rgya mtshor byang chub shog /
NK121(ko)003:5680: ces pa'ang 'grel ba bskul ba po rang nyid kyis spar du bskrun pa'i smon tshig tu sbyar ba'o //
